translated: If that is so, then the example would be different from the known nature.

original: dus phyis rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i don gang yin pa yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus phyis rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i don gang yin pa yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the object realized by subsequent inference would be something completely different.

original: 'on te de ni bzung ba kho na yin mod kyi 'on kyang brjed pa de'i phyir 'di la skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de ni bzung ba kho na yin mod kyi 'on kyang brjed pa de'i phyir 'di la skyon med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is indeed remembered, but because it is forgotten, there is no fault,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds:

original: bshad pa / gal te brjed phyir skyon med na //
analyzed: bshad pa / gal te brjed phyir skyon med na //
translated: If there is no fault because it is forgotten,

original: de nyid phyir na dpe ma yin //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na dpe ma yin //
translated: then it is not an example.

original: gal te brjed pa de phyis yang gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas ci lta ba bzhin du dran par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te brjed pa de phyis yang gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas ci lta ba bzhin du dran par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that because it is forgotten, but later it is remembered just as it is through reasoning, inference is not meaningless,

original: 'o na ni brjed pa ji ltar dpe nyid yin /
analyzed: 'o na ni brjed pa ji ltar dpe nyid yin /
translated: then how could it be an example?

original: dpe'i sgo nas ni sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa yin na /
analyzed: dpe'i sgo nas ni sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa yin na /
translated: If the proof is engaged through an example,

original: gal te de brjed na dper ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te de brjed na dper ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could it be an example if it is forgotten?

original: gal te rtags kyi sngon rol du ma tshang ba med par dpe nyid du dran pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rtags kyi sngon rol du ma tshang ba med par dpe nyid du dran pa yin na /
translated: If it is remembered as an example without incompleteness prior to the reason,

original: de'i tshe de la rtags gzhan gyis ci bya /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la rtags gzhan gyis ci bya /
translated: then what would another reason do at that time?

original: de nyid yang nas yang du dran par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid yang nas yang du dran par byed do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is remembered again and again,

original: thug pa med par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: thug pa med par 'gyur ro /
translated: then there is an infinite regress.

original: 'on te de'i tshe brjed na ni dpe nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe brjed na ni dpe nyid ma yin no //
translated: But if it is forgotten at that time, then it is not an example.

original: ci ste du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs bzhin du dpe med pa kho nar brjed pa de rtags las rtogs par byed pa yin pa de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: ci ste du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs bzhin du dpe med pa kho nar brjed pa de rtags las rtogs par byed pa yin pa de'i tshe ni /
translated: But if, like the understanding of fire from smoke, it is understood from the evidence without any example, and it is forgotten, then at that time,

original: dus kyi cha ma tshar ba med pa la khyab pa de sngar gyi mngon sum nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir khyad par rtogs pa med pas ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin /
analyzed: dus kyi cha ma tshar ba med pa la khyab pa de sngar gyi mngon sum nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir khyad par rtogs pa med pas ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin /
translated: since the pervasion of the non-exhaustion of the part of time is apprehended by the previous perception, there is no understanding of the specific property. Therefore, how can it be a valid cognition?

original: dran pa yod na de la tha snyad byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dran pa yod na de la tha snyad byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: If memory exists, then it is conventionally designated.

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi bdag nyid thams cad bzung zin pa nyid ji lta ba @226a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi bdag nyid thams cad bzung zin pa nyid ji lta ba @226a * //
translated: In this way, when all the entities of natural inference are apprehended just as they are,

original: bzhin du tha snyad du byed pa na tshad ma nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: bzhin du tha snyad du byed pa na tshad ma nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: then it is a valid cognition when it is conventionally designated.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de la ni mthong ba gzhan dang chos mtshungs pa nyid kyis tha snyad du byar rung ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ni mthong ba gzhan dang chos mtshungs pa nyid kyis tha snyad du byar rung ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is suitable to be conventionally designated as similar to another seeing.

original: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te sngon de 'dra ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te sngon de 'dra ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: But it is not like that here, because there is no prior example.

original: goms pas bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: goms pas bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not produced by habituation.

original: 'di ni mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba yang ma 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba yang ma 'brel pa ste /
translated: It is also not related to say, ‚ÄúThis is seeing.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible that it would have a different aspect.

original: 'di ni bzung ba ni nyid dran pa yin no zhes ma grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ni bzung ba ni nyid dran pa yin no zhes ma grub ste /
translated: It is not established that ‚Äúthis is the memory of what was apprehended,‚Äù

original: ma bzung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bzung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not apprehended.

original: mngon sum gyi tshad mas ni rang gi dus na gnas pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi tshad mas ni rang gi dus na gnas pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: A valid cognition of direct perception apprehends the nature that exists at its own time.

original: de lta ma yin na 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas par bzung ba'i phyir ni de nyid kyi tsha 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas par bzung ba'i phyir ni de nyid kyi tsha 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then because it would apprehend that which has the end of death, it would die at that time.

original: rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyis 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa dang ldan par 'dzin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyis 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa dang ldan par 'dzin te /
translated: It apprehends that which has the end of death by the mere fact of following it.

original: mngon sum ring pos ring po 'dzin //
analyzed: mngon sum ring pos ring po 'dzin //
translated: Longness is apprehended by direct perception of long.

original: ring min pas ni cig shos 'dzin //üîΩde nyid tshe na 'chi ba yi //
analyzed: ring min pas ni cig shos 'dzin // de nyid tshe na 'chi ba yi //
translated: Shortness is apprehended by direct perception of short.üîΩAt that time, it does not apprehend

original: mtha' dang ldan par de mi 'dzin //
analyzed: mtha' dang ldan par de mi 'dzin //
translated: the end of death.

original: gal te rjes su mi 'jug pa yin na de lta na ni des dus gzhan khyab pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rjes su mi 'jug pa yin na de lta na ni des dus gzhan khyab pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not engage in the other, then it would not apprehend the other time.

original: des na khyad par mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa bzung ba nyid la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: des na khyad par mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa bzung ba nyid la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, how could it engage in the apprehension of the specific that is inferred?

original: ji ltar na de nyid dpe yin pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ji ltar na de nyid dpe yin pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa ma yin /
translated: And how could it not apprehend the universal because it is an example of that?

original: ci ste dus gzhan dang 'brel par mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: ci ste dus gzhan dang 'brel par mthong ba yin na /
translated: But if it sees the connection with another time,üîΩthen it would see that which arises at another time, because it would establish the nature of that.

original: dus gzhan dag tu gzhan skyes pa gang yin pa de la de'i dngos po grub pa'i phyir 'dis khyad par mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dus gzhan dag tu gzhan skyes pa gang yin pa de la de'i dngos po grub pa'i phyir 'dis khyad par mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it would see the specific.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: gal te mthong na de dngos ni //
analyzed: gal te mthong na de dngos ni //
translated: If it sees, then that nature

original: tshad mas grub na dngos gzhan la //
analyzed: tshad mas grub na dngos gzhan la //
translated: is established by valid knowledge.

original: de nyid sgro 'dogs phyin ci log / des grub tshad can nyid ma yin //
analyzed: de nyid sgro 'dogs phyin ci log / des grub tshad can nyid ma yin //
translated: it is not a valid cognition.

original: gal te mthong ba gzhan yin yang //
analyzed: gal te mthong ba gzhan yin yang //
translated: If you say that although the seeing is different,

original: phyis dus gzhan gyi tshe de nyid 'di yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba yin zhes len to zhe na /
analyzed: phyis dus gzhan gyi tshe de nyid 'di yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba yin zhes len to zhe na /
translated: later, at another time, it is established as ‚Äúthat very thing,‚Äù

original: 'o na ni de ma yin pa la der sgro 'dogs pa de nges par phyin ci log yin te gzhan nyid du mthong ba ni de kho nar de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na ni de ma yin pa la der sgro 'dogs pa de nges par phyin ci log yin te gzhan nyid du mthong ba ni de kho nar de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: then that reification of what is not that as that is certainly error, because seeing difference does not become seeing identity in reality.

original: ma mthong ba la ni mthong ba'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs pa tsam zhig nus kyi de nyid du gzung bar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba la ni mthong ba'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs pa tsam zhig nus kyi de nyid du gzung bar ni ma yin te /
translated: It is possible that in the case of nonseeing, there is merely the reification of the nature of seeing, but not the apprehension of identity.

original: sngar mthong ba de ni sngar gyi shes pas gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang ma 'dres par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba de ni sngar gyi shes pas gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang ma 'dres par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the previous seeing is apprehended by the previous cognition without being mixed with the nature of another.

original: gal te ma bzung ba de lta na yang rjes su dpag pas de nyid du 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: gal te ma bzung ba de lta na yang rjes su dpag pas de nyid du 'dzin gyi /
translated: If you say that although it is not apprehended in that way, it is apprehended as that by inference,üîΩbut not as different,

original: gzhan nyid du ni ma yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan nyid du ni ma yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni sngar mthong ba rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni sngar mthong ba rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because inference is the pursuit of what was seen before.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni dran pa tsam las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni dran pa tsam las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Inference is nothing other than memory.

original: ci ste rjes su dpag pa dngos po 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
analyzed: ci ste rjes su dpag pa dngos po 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
translated: But if inference has the nature of apprehending things,üîΩthen,

original: de'i tshe / mngon sum cig @226b shos gcig yin phyir //
analyzed: de'i tshe / mngon sum cig @226b shos gcig yin phyir //
translated: because one of the two is direct perception,

original: gcig grub pa na gnyi ga'ang 'grub //
analyzed: gcig grub pa na gnyi ga'ang 'grub //
translated: when one is established, both are established.

original: gal te mngon sum dang cig shos rang bzhin gcig nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dang cig shos rang bzhin gcig nyid yin na /
translated: If direct perception and the other have the same nature,

original: de'i tshe mngon sum mam gzhan yang rung ba'i tshad ma gcig nyid kyi grub pa'i phyir gzhan tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe mngon sum mam gzhan yang rung ba'i tshad ma gcig nyid kyi grub pa'i phyir gzhan tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: then, because one valid cognition, whether direct perception or inference, is established, the other is not a valid cognition,

original: gzhan gyi khyad par cung zad kyang byas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi khyad par cung zad kyang byas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not perform the slightest function that is different from the other.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga gsal ba'i rnam pa can nam cig shos su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga gsal ba'i rnam pa can nam cig shos su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, both would have the aspect of clarity or both would be the other.

original: ci ste mig la sogs pa'i byed pa med pas mi gsal ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste mig la sogs pa'i byed pa med pas mi gsal ba nyid yin te /
translated: But if they are not clear because they do not function like the eye and so on,üîΩthen,

original: de ni gsal ba nyid du rab tu grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni gsal ba nyid du rab tu grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is well established as clarity.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gal te gsal bar snang ba 'di //
analyzed: gal te gsal bar snang ba 'di //
translated: If this appearance of clarity

original: mig sogs rgyu mtshan can yin na //
analyzed: mig sogs rgyu mtshan can yin na //
translated: Were due to the eye, etc.,

original: gzugs 'dzin pa la snang ba ni ;
analyzed: gzugs 'dzin pa la snang ba ni ;
translated: The appearance in the apprehension of form

original: / sbyor byed min pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: / sbyor byed min pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Would not be a contributory condition.

original: 'on te gsal ba nyid snang bas byas pa yin na ni de'i tshe snang ba yod pa na rjes su dpag pa mi gsal bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba nyid snang bas byas pa yin na ni de'i tshe snang ba yod pa na rjes su dpag pa mi gsal bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But if clarity is produced by the appearance, then when the appearance exists, how could the inference not be clear?

original: snang ba ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the appearance is intermittent.

original: 'o na snang ba de don dam par yod pa yin yang nges par mi byed pa de dngos po 'dzin par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na snang ba de don dam par yod pa yin yang nges par mi byed pa de dngos po 'dzin par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But if that appearance exists ultimately, but does not definitely produce clarity, how could it be a thing that apprehends an object?

original: snang ba dang bral ba'i dngos po tsam 'dzin pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba dang bral ba'i dngos po tsam 'dzin pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: There is no fault because it apprehends just the thing that is free from the appearance.

original: snang ba dang ldan pa la de dang bral bar 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni bab col yin no //
analyzed: snang ba dang ldan pa la de dang bral bar 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni bab col yin no //
translated: To say that it apprehends that which is free from the appearance in that which possesses the appearance is nonsense.

original: de ltar gyur na ni de nyid spyi 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir de ni khyad par mthong ba ma yin no //üîΩgzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni de nyid spyi 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir de ni khyad par mthong ba ma yin no // gzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yis //
translated: If that were so, then it would be the apprehension of a universal, and it would not be the perception of a particular.

original: zhen pa dran pa yin par shes //
analyzed: zhen pa dran pa yin par shes //
translated: It is known as memory because it connects with another.

original: gal te de rtags la ltos phyir //
analyzed: gal te de rtags la ltos phyir //
translated: If it is not memory because it depends on a sign,

original: dran min ma yin 'khrul phyir ro //
analyzed: dran min ma yin 'khrul phyir ro //
translated: it is not memory because it is mistaken.

original: gzhan yang / 'di ni sngon mthong ba mtshams sbyor ba tsam yin gyi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa de'i tshe dran pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'di ni sngon mthong ba mtshams sbyor ba tsam yin gyi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa de'i tshe dran pa nyid yin no //
translated: Moreover, if it is merely the connection with what was seen before, and it does not apprehend the nature of the manifestation, then it is memory.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag rang bzhin gcig nyid yin pa de'i tshe gzhal bya bla lhag cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag rang bzhin gcig nyid yin pa de'i tshe gzhal bya bla lhag cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ;
translated: If direct perception and inference have the same nature, then there is not the slightest difference in their objects.

original: 'di dran pa kho na yin gyi dngos po 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dran pa kho na yin gyi dngos po 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is memory, but it does not apprehend an entity.

original: gal te rtags las skyes pa de ci ltar dran pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtags las skyes pa de ci ltar dran pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it arises from a sign, how can it be memory?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: khyod kyi 'dod pas rtags nyid med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dod pas rtags nyid med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because, according to your assertion, there is no sign.

original: dpe dang don dag gcig pas tshul gsum med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe dang don dag gcig pas tshul gsum med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the example and the object of inference are the same, and the three modes are absent.

original: nged kyi phyogs la ni de spyi'i yul can gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nged kyi phyogs la ni de spyi'i yul can gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: But in our system, it is a subsequent cognition that has a universal for its object.

original: gang zhig sngon gyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa de ni dran par bya ba yin gyi gzung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig sngon gyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa de ni dran par bya ba yin gyi gzung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The object that is understood as the prior nature is remembered, but it is not apprehended,

original: gzung bar bya ba nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not understood as something to be apprehended.

original: rjes su dpag pa dran pa las gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dran pa las gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Inference is not different from memory,

original: rtags las skyes pa'i dran pa kho na rjes su dpag pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir gang gis de nyid lan @227a * //
analyzed: rtags las skyes pa'i dran pa kho na rjes su dpag pa yin no // de'i phyir gang gis de nyid lan @227a * //
translated: because memory that arises from a logical reason is itself inference.

original: cig ma yin par mthong ba de ni dran pa kho na'o //
analyzed: cig ma yin par mthong ba de ni dran pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, when one sees that very object more than once, it is memory.

original: 'on de ltar yod do zhes ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'on de ltar yod do zhes ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: But how is it understood that it exists in that way?

original: da ltar yod pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi stobs kyis rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar yod pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi stobs kyis rtogs pa yin te /
translated: It is understood by the power of the property of the subject that exists in the present.

original: phyogs de na gnas pa'i du ba ni phyogs de nyid na yod pa'i mes bskyed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs de na gnas pa'i du ba ni phyogs de nyid na yod pa'i mes bskyed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The smoke that exists in that place is generated by the fire that exists in that place.

original: de ltar sngar 'brel pa bzung bas thog ma med pa'i bag chags sad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar sngar 'brel pa bzung bas thog ma med pa'i bag chags sad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because of the arousal of beginningless latent potentialities through the prior grasping of a connection, memory is produced.

original: de ltar yin dang / rjes su dpag pa thams cad ni dran pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis yin pa'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas tshad ma rnam pa gnyis yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yin dang / rjes su dpag pa thams cad ni dran pa yin no // de'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis yin pa'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas tshad ma rnam pa gnyis yin te /
translated: And thus, all inferences are memories.

original: dngos dang cig shos kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par las ma rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
analyzed: dngos dang cig shos kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par las ma rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
translated: Therefore, because there are two kinds of objects of comprehension, there are two kinds of valid cognitions, direct perception and inference, because there is no other kind of object of comprehension apart from the particular and the universal.üîΩThis is the position.

original: de la mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: de la mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul pa'o //
translated: Among them, direct perception is free from conceptuality and is nonerroneous.

original: khyad par la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i don snang ba'i shes pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i don snang ba'i shes pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: A conceptual cognition is a cognition that appears to an object that is related to a qualifier, etc.

original: gzhan du snang ba ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du snang ba ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: An erroneous cognition is one that appears otherwise.

original: de gnyi ga dang bral ba ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: de gnyi ga dang bral ba ni mngon sum yin no //
translated: That which is free from both of those is direct perception.

original: gal te 'khrul pa nyid ni phyis mngon sum gyis gzhan du mthong ba las rtogs pa yin no /
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa nyid ni phyis mngon sum gyis gzhan du mthong ba las rtogs pa yin no /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is an erroneous cognition understood?‚Äù it is understood from the fact that it is later seen to be otherwise by direct perception.

original: rtog pa dang bral ba nyid gang las yin /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral ba nyid gang las yin /
translated: How could it be free from conceptuality?

original: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni de med na 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni de med na 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Inference that is preceded by direct perception does not engage its object if it is not preceded by direct perception.

original: mngon sum mtha' dag kyang sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa can du skye ba yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum mtha' dag kyang sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa can du skye ba yin te /
translated: All direct perception arises in dependence on language.

original: des na mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag nyid rtogs pa med par rtogs par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: des na mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag nyid rtogs pa med par rtogs par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: Thus, since direct perception is conceptual, how could it be possible for it to perceive itself without conceptualization?

original: gang gi dang po lta ba'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba skye ba de'i yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni dran pa la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nye ba las skye ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi dang po lta ba'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba skye ba de'i yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni dran pa la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nye ba las skye ba yin la /
translated: In the case of the first, the visual consciousness that arises free from conceptuality, its conceptual consciousness arises from the assembly of conditions such as memory.

original: de yang dbang po'i byed pa las 'gyur bas mngon sum kho na yin pas /
analyzed: de yang dbang po'i byed pa las 'gyur bas mngon sum kho na yin pas /
translated: Since that arises from the activity of the sense faculty, it is direct perception.

original: de la yang rtog pa med par ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang rtog pa med par ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could it be established without conceptuality?

original: 'di la lan du /üîΩmngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni //
analyzed: 'di la lan du / mngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni //
translated: In response to this, it is said:üîΩDirect perception free from conceptuality

original: mngon sum nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: is established by direct perception itself.

original: kun gyi rnam rtog ming rten can //
analyzed: kun gyi rnam rtog ming rten can //
translated: All conceptualization is based on names.

original: so sor rang gis rig bya yin //
analyzed: so sor rang gis rig bya yin //
translated: It is to be personally experienced by each one for himself.

original: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar ni rang rig pa kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar ni rang rig pa kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Direct perception is realized by means of self-awareness alone, free from conceptual differentiation.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni ming skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni ming skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: Conceptual differentiation is that which generates names.

original: ming gis kyang rnam bar rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: ming gis kyang rnam bar rtog pa yin no //
translated: And names are conceptual differentiations.

original: ming gi rten can gyi rnam par rtog pa de ni so so rang rig pas nyams su myong ba yin te /
analyzed: ming gi rten can gyi rnam par rtog pa de ni so so rang rig pas nyams su myong ba yin te /
translated: That conceptual differentiation which is based on names is to be personally experienced by each one for himself,

original: rnam par brtag par bya ba ni rang rig pas nyams su myong ba dang / snang ba mig la sogs pas nyams su myong bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par brtag par bya ba ni rang rig pas nyams su myong ba dang / snang ba mig la sogs pas nyams su myong bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of conceptual differentiation is to be experienced by means of self-awareness and the appearance is to be experienced by means of the eye, etc.

original: des na @227b 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas na rnam par rtog pa can dang / cig shos kyi shes pa dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na @227b 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas na rnam par rtog pa can dang / cig shos kyi shes pa dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, because of the presence of mutually contradictory properties, the conceptual and the other cognition are certainly different.

original: ci ste yang de ni thams cad kyi tshe yod pas shes pa gcig kho nar zad do zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang de ni thams cad kyi tshe yod pas shes pa gcig kho nar zad do zhe na /
translated: But if it exists at all times, then there is only one cognition.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
analyzed: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
translated: The mind is withdrawn from all objects,

original: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med pas //
translated: and the inner self is motionless.

original: gnas na'ang mig gis gzugs dag ni //
analyzed: gnas na'ang mig gis gzugs dag ni //
translated: Even when it is in a state of rest, the mind is aware of the visual forms

original: mthong ba'i blo de dbang skyes yin //üîΩgal te rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs pa med par /
analyzed: mthong ba'i blo de dbang skyes yin // gal te rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs pa med par /
translated: that are seen, and this awareness is born of the sense faculty.

original: dbang po mi 'jug pa nyid yin na /üîΩde med par rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs sam /
analyzed: dbang po mi 'jug pa nyid yin na / de med par rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs sam /
translated: If the sense faculty does not operate without the presence of a conceptual cognition,

original: rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du gyur pa na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du gyur pa na /
translated: then when there is no conceptual cognition, either in a state of distraction or in a state of sleep,

original: don 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i byed pa med par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: don 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i byed pa med par 'gyur ro ;
translated: the sense faculty will not apprehend the object.

original: / des na de'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtag pa'i snang ba dang / ma 'brel pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: / des na de'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtag pa'i snang ba dang / ma 'brel pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in that state, the appearance of the conceptual cognition and the non-related cognition are understood only by direct perception.

original: gal te 'di la rnam par rtog pa 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de'i tshe nyid rtog pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di la rnam par rtog pa 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de'i tshe nyid rtog pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is said that there is no relation to conceptual cognition in this case, then is it not non-conceptual?

original: ci ltar gnas skabs de rnam par rtog pas dben pa yin /
analyzed: ci ltar gnas skabs de rnam par rtog pas dben pa yin /
translated: How can that state be devoid of conceptual cognition?

original: ci ste de'i tshe rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid yin na de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste de'i tshe rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid yin na de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: But if at that time it does not conceptualize, then how could it be understood that ‚Äúthis is non-conceptual‚Äù?

original: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Without conceptualization, there is no designation.

original: gzhan la tha snyad du ma yas par yang gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la tha snyad du ma yas par yang gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And one thing cannot designate another thing.

original: de lta ma yin na skad cig ma nyid la yang tha snyad byed par rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis ci dgos she na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na skad cig ma nyid la yang tha snyad byed par rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis ci dgos she na /
translated: Otherwise, why use an autonomous argument to designate even momentariness?

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: In response to this, we say:

original: slar yang cung zad rnam rtog na //
analyzed: slar yang cung zad rnam rtog na //
translated: If you conceptualize it again,

original: kho bo'i rnam rtog 'di 'drar 'gyur //üîΩcis rig sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi //
analyzed: kho bo'i rnam rtog 'di 'drar 'gyur // cis rig sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi //
translated: then my conceptualization would be like this.üîΩHow is it known? It is not the case that

original: dbang po'i rtogs pa la med do //
analyzed: dbang po'i rtogs pa la med do //
translated: the cognition of the sense faculty is in the prior state.

original: de nyid kyi tshe 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni skye ba de ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni skye ba de ma yin te /
translated: At that time, the conceptualization ‚Äúthis is non-conceptual‚Äù does not arise.

original: de lta ma yin na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes par smra ba la yang /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes par smra ba la yang /
translated: Otherwise, even in the case of a direct perception that is a conceptual cognition,

original: ci srid du 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o snyam pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa de srid du de rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tha snyad ga las yin /
analyzed: ci srid du 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o snyam pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa de srid du de rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tha snyad ga las yin /
translated: as long as the ascertainment ‚ÄúThis is conceptual‚Äù has not arisen, how could it be called conceptual?

original: des na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tha snyad la yang /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tha snyad la yang /
translated: Therefore, even in the case of a conceptual designation,

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan 'dod par bya dgos shing de la yang gzhan yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan 'dod par bya dgos shing de la yang gzhan yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: one must assert that it is conceptual in dependence on another, and since that also is conceptual in dependence on another, there would be an infinite regress, and so there would be no understanding.

original: ci ste de rang nyid kho nar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur bas de la gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste de rang nyid kho nar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur bas de la gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
translated: But if it is conceptual by itself alone, what need is there for another?

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
translated: Since a nonconceptual cognition is also by nature a cognition,

original: rnam par rtog pas ci @228a * //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas ci @228a * //
translated: what need is there for conceptual thought?

original: bya ste ; des na gnyis ka la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: bya ste ; des na gnyis ka la yang mtshungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is the same for both.

original: 'on te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la ni /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la ni /
translated: But if it is associated with discursive thought,

original: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes phyis tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes phyis tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then later on it is designated as associated with discursive thought.

original: 'di la yang nges par rtog par byed pas rnam par rtog pa brgyud pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di la yang nges par rtog par byed pas rnam par rtog pa brgyud pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa yin la /
translated: In this case, it is designated as having arisen from such a discursive thought process, because it is a determinative cognition.

original: rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs su ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs su ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a case of discursive thought being subsumed,

original: de la rnam par rtog pa med par gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa med par gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is designated as having become non discursive.

original: gal te de'i tshe med pa la rnam par rtog pas tha snyad ji ltar byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe med pa la rnam par rtog pas tha snyad ji ltar byed ce na /
translated: If it does not exist at that time, how can it be designated as discursive thought?

original: shi ba la shi'o zhes ji ltar tha snyad byed /
analyzed: shi ba la shi'o zhes ji ltar tha snyad byed /
translated: How can it be designated as dead when it is dead?

original: de lta ma yin na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du ji ltar tha snyad byed /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du ji ltar tha snyad byed /
translated: Otherwise, how can it be designated as associated with discursive thought when it is associated with discursive thought?

original: yang de'i rigs can mthong ba las so zhe na /
analyzed: yang de'i rigs can mthong ba las so zhe na /
translated: It is seen in one of its type.

original: 'di la yang rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na yang nas yang du mthong ba bkag pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na yang nas yang du mthong ba bkag pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: And here, even in the state of the collection of conceptualization, the seeing is not blocked.

original: des na mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / phan tshun med pa yang 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos dag ni gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / phan tshun med pa yang 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos dag ni gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of the occurrence of the difference of characteristics and the mutual absence, the conceptual and the non-conceptual are not identical.

original: ci ste tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gzhan nyid skye ba yin la /
analyzed: ci ste tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gzhan nyid skye ba yin la /
translated: But if you say that the conceptual arises from the existence of the collection,

original: de med pas ni rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de med pas ni rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: and that the non-conceptual arises from its non-existence,

original: de ni ma 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: de ni ma 'brel ba ste /
translated: that is not connected.

original: gal te tshogs pa las rtog ni //
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa las rtog ni //
translated: If the conceptual arises from the collection,

original: sngo ser tha dad med 'gyur te //üîΩbsdoms pa gzhan du gyur pa ni ;
analyzed: sngo ser tha dad med 'gyur te // bsdoms pa gzhan du gyur pa ni ;
translated: it would be no different from blue and yellow,

original: / skyes so zhes ni rtog phyir ro //
analyzed: / skyes so zhes ni rtog phyir ro //
translated: because it is imagined that the collection is transformed into something else.

original: de ni der sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa bsdoms pa gzhan zhig skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni der sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa bsdoms pa gzhan zhig skyes pa yin te /
translated: That is, it is imagined that something else arises from the collection of blue, yellow, etc.

original: tshogs pa'i khyad par srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i khyad par srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference of the collection is possible.

original: ci ste ngo shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ci ste ngo shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: But if you say that they are different because they are recognized,

original: 'di ni sngon po de nyid yin gyi bsdoms pa gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir de dag tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni sngon po de nyid yin gyi bsdoms pa gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir de dag tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is understood that this is the same blue, not another color.

original: tha dad par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dag cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: tha dad par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dag cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
translated: The idea that they are different is the same for those who have conceptual thoughts.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //üîΩdran pa la sogs pa 'di ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do // dran pa la sogs pa 'di ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, perception is non-conceptual.

original: dbang po'i don 'dzin pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdbang pos gzung ba'i don la ni sgra dang sbyor ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i don 'dzin pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro // dbang pos gzung ba'i don la ni sgra dang sbyor ba ma yin te /
translated: Memory and so on are not the cause of conceptual thought in the sense perception because they engage in apprehending the object of the sense faculty.

original: de brjod pa nyid kyi sgra med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de brjod pa nyid kyi sgra med pa'i phyir te /
translated: The object apprehended by the sense faculty is not connected with words because it is not expressed by words.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang spyi dbang po'i gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang spyi dbang po'i gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because a word is not applied to a specific characteristic and a universal is not apprehended by the sense faculty.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na bshad pa /
translated: Why is that so? It is explained:

original: gcig tu mthong ba'i khyab par ni //üîΩgzhan 'gal zhig tu mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig tu mthong ba'i khyab par ni // gzhan 'gal zhig tu mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: But it is not possible to see the universal as one,üîΩbecause it is seen as different in different things.

original: de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
analyzed: de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
translated: The universal is not different from the particulars,

original: @228b yod min tha dad blo med phyir //
analyzed: @228b yod min tha dad blo med phyir //
translated: because there is no cognition of difference.üîΩThe reason is stated: ‚ÄúBecause the particulars do not follow the object and time.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir khyad par ni yul dang dus kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te gang gi phyir gzhan du mngon sum de nyid dam gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par ni yul dang dus kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te gang gi phyir gzhan du mngon sum de nyid dam gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: The particulars are not the same as the object and time, because the object and time are not seen by another perception.

original: de ni dus gzhan na gnas pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dus gzhan na gnas pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is, the particulars do not exist at another time.

original: mngon sum gyis ni rang gi dus su chad pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni rang gi dus su chad pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yin te /
translated: A perception cognizes an entity that is cut off from other times.

original: des na snga ma phyi ma la mngon sum ma yin la /
analyzed: des na snga ma phyi ma la mngon sum ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the previous perception is not the later perception,

original: phyi ma la yang snga ma la ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi ma la yang snga ma la ma yin no //
translated: and the later perception is not the previous perception.

original: gal te ngo shes pas de nyid 'di nyid yin no zhes snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ngo shes pas de nyid 'di nyid yin no zhes snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: But if you say that recognition apprehends the previous and later moments, thinking ‚ÄúThat is the same as this,‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: we reply that it does not.

original: ngo shes pas ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ngo shes pas ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Recognition is not a perception,

original: de la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not depend on the sense faculties.

original: 'di ltar / dbang po rung ba'i yul gnas pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dbang po rung ba'i yul gnas pa //
translated: The sense faculty is present in the object,

original: 'byung 'gyur 'das dang 'byung la min //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur 'das dang 'byung la min //
translated: but not in the past or future.

original: de la brten pa'i rnam shes kyang //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i rnam shes kyang //
translated: The consciousness that is based on it

original: dus gzhan dag tu 'byung la min //
analyzed: dus gzhan dag tu 'byung la min //
translated: is not in the other times.

original: dbang po'i shes pas yul dang dus khyab par 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pas yul dang dus khyab par 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The sense consciousness does not apprehend the object and time pervasively.

original: de ltar yin na ni thams cad rnam pa thams cad mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yin na ni thams cad rnam pa thams cad mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it did, then everyone would see everything.

original: gal te dbang po 'das pa'i dngos po la mi 'jug kyang /
analyzed: gal te dbang po 'das pa'i dngos po la mi 'jug kyang /
translated: Even though the sense faculty does not engage past things,

original: de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
translated: what is the contradiction in the consciousness that is based on it engaging them?

original: gal te de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa la 'jug na ni mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa la 'jug na ni mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: If the consciousness that is based on it engages the past, then the eye would also engage it.

original: mig gzhan du 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gzhan du 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The eye does not engage in other things.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa la ni mig gi byed pa rtog pa med de /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa la ni mig gi byed pa rtog pa med de /
translated: There is no conception of the function of the eye in apprehending the prior and the subsequent.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag la ni /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag la ni /
translated: In the prior and the subsequent,

original: dran pa dang / srid par rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa dang / srid par rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: memory and the inference of existence engage.

original: gal te de nyid dbang po 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de nyid dbang po 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the universal is the object of the sense faculty,

original: rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: then inference would absurdly follow that it is perception.

original: de'i phyir khyad par rnams ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par rnams ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, universals do not pervade their instances.

original: spyi dbang pos gzung ba rjes su 'gro ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyi dbang pos gzung ba rjes su 'gro ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the universal is the object of the sense faculty,

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: that is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩde las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
translated: BecauseüîΩThe universal does not exist as different from the particulars.

original: yod min tha dad blo med phyir //üîΩkhyad par rnams rjes su 'gro ba ma yin la /
analyzed: yod min tha dad blo med phyir // khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro ba ma yin la /
translated: There is no cognition of difference.üîΩUniversals do not pervade their instances.

original: spyi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor are they particulars.

original: de ni med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not exist.

original: khyad par rnams ni yod pa yin na de dag rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par rnams ni yod pa yin na de dag rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: If the particulars exist, they do not pervade their instances.

original: spyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin yang de ni med pa'i phyir ma mthong bas dbang pos gzung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ni mi srid do //
analyzed: spyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin yang de ni med pa'i phyir ma mthong bas dbang pos gzung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ni mi srid do //
translated: Even if the universal does not pervade its instances, because it does not exist, it is not seen. Therefore it is impossible for it to be the object of the sense faculties.

original: 'dir spyi ni snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir spyi ni snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Here the universal is not manifest.

original: rnam pa gzhan snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the other aspect, the non-appearance, does not exist.

original: tha mi dad pa yin na ni gsal ba nyid yin la de yang rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yin na ni gsal ba nyid yin la de yang rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
translated: If they are not different, then they are manifest, and that is not universal.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par brjod du med pa'i phyir yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par brjod du med pa'i phyir yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it does not exist because it cannot be said to be either different or not different.

original: de'i phyir dbang po las skyes @229a * //üîΩblo // thams cad khyad par yul can yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po las skyes @229a * // blo // thams cad khyad par yul can yin //
translated: Therefore,üîΩAll cognitions produced by the senses

original: khyad par rnams la sgra dag ni //
analyzed: khyad par rnams la sgra dag ni //
translated: Have particular objects.

original: 'jug pa srid pa yod min te //üîΩkhyad par rjes 'gor med pas na //
analyzed: 'jug pa srid pa yod min te // khyad par rjes 'gor med pas na //
translated: Words cannot possibly applyüîΩTo particulars.

original: brda 'jug pa ni med phyir ro //
analyzed: brda 'jug pa ni med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no application of words to particulars,üîΩThe application of words is impossible.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med par snang ba la ni spyi'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med par snang ba la ni spyi'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The universal does not exist in the appearance that is not universal.

original: khyad par rnams la sgra 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par rnams la sgra 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Words do not apply to particulars.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pas brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pas brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no application of words to particulars, the application of words is impossible.

original: brda ni tha snyad pa dag gi yul dang dus gzhan du tha snyad 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: brda ni tha snyad pa dag gi yul dang dus gzhan du tha snyad 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa yin te /
translated: A sign is accepted as a means of designating a thing in another place or at another time,

original: de lta ma yin na ni zhen pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni zhen pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, it would be a mere attachment.

original: chos kyi don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chos kyi don du yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is for the sake of the thing,

original: de ltar su zhig yid ches des na yul dang dus so sor nges pa la ni brda 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar su zhig yid ches des na yul dang dus so sor nges pa la ni brda 'jug pa med do //
translated: who would believe that? Therefore, a sign does not designate a thing in a particular place or time.

original: de'i phyir khyad par ni sgra'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par ni sgra'i yul ma yin no //
translated: Thus, a particular is not the object of a word.

original: sgra rnams yul yang gang de nyid //
analyzed: sgra rnams yul yang gang de nyid //
translated: The object of words is that which is

original: de rnams la ni yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: de rnams la ni yang dag sbyor //
translated: connected with them.

original: des yang dag par sbyor ba ni khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: des yang dag par sbyor ba ni khyad par ma yin no //
translated: That which is connected with a word is not a particular.

original: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the cognition that apprehends a particular is not conceptual,

original: gang rtog pa dang bcas pa yang khyad par 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: gang rtog pa dang bcas pa yang khyad par 'dzin pa med de /
translated: and that which is conceptual does not apprehend a particular,

original: sgra yi spyi la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra yi spyi la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is connected with the universal of the word.

original: ci'i phyir 'di brjod /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di brjod /
translated: Why is this stated?

original: sgra rnams yul ni gang yin pa //
analyzed: sgra rnams yul ni gang yin pa //
translated: The object of words is that which is

original: de nyid de rnams kyis sbyor byed //
analyzed: de nyid de rnams kyis sbyor byed //
translated: connected with them.

original: des na khyad par ni sbyor nas 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na khyad par ni sbyor nas 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the distinction is not grasped through the application of a word.

original: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that grasps the distinction is not conceptual.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de yang khyad par 'dzin pa ni yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de yang khyad par 'dzin pa ni yin te /
translated: That which is conceptual does grasp a distinction,

original: spyi sgra dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi sgra dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is applied to a word that signifies a universal.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bshad pa de /
analyzed: bshad pa de /
translated: It is said:üîΩThe connection is

original: 'di yi zhes ni 'brel pa la //
analyzed: 'di yi zhes ni 'brel pa la //
translated: with this.

original: don snang ba ni gang yin pa //
analyzed: don snang ba ni gang yin pa //
translated: Those that appear as the referent

original: de dag nyid ni 'brel yin na //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni 'brel yin na //
translated: are themselves the connection.

original: de yi dbang po'i spyod yul min //
analyzed: de yi dbang po'i spyod yul min //
translated: They are not the domain of the sense faculties.

original: don mthong yang de ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa yin la 'di ni 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i shes pa la snang ba de dag nyid brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: don mthong yang de ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa yin la 'di ni 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i shes pa la snang ba de dag nyid brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin no //
translated: Although the referent is seen, the connection is made by the consciousness that appears in the statement ‚ÄúThis is the expression of that‚Äù and ‚ÄúThat is the referent of this.‚Äù Those that appear are themselves the connection, which is characterized by the expressed and the expression.

original: de'i dbang po'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i dbang po'i yul ma yin no //
translated: They are not the domain of the sense faculties.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the statement, ‚ÄúThis is the content of that‚Äù?

original: 'di las 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di las 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: The content of that is what is to be understood from that.

original: ges pa gang gis rtogs par bya ba yin te /üîΩci lkog tu gyur pa'i don can rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas sam /
analyzed: ges pa gang gis rtogs par bya ba yin te / ci lkog tu gyur pa'i don can rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas sam /
translated: By what means is it to be understood?üîΩIs it by means of a conceptual cognition that has an obscure object?

original: 'on te mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis yin /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis yin /
translated: Or is it by means of a direct perception that has a manifest object?

original: gal te mngon du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis de rtogs par bya ba yin na ni dbang po'i tshogs don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mngon du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis de rtogs par bya ba yin na ni dbang po'i tshogs don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is to be understood by means of a direct perception that has a manifest object, then the collection of sense faculties would be purposeless.

original: 'on te lkog tu gyur pa'i don can gyis yin na ni /
analyzed: 'on te lkog tu gyur pa'i don can gyis yin na ni /
translated: But if it is by means of a conceptual cognition that has an obscure object,

original: de'i tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: then at that time the object of the sense faculties would not be related to it,

original: de'i @229b tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i @229b tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at that time the object of the sense faculties would not exist.

original: yang na don dang sgra med kyang 'di'i rjod par byed pa 'di'i yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na don dang sgra med kyang 'di'i rjod par byed pa 'di'i yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, even though there is no object and no word, it is related to it in the sense that it expresses it.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / de tshe gsal bar snang ba yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de tshe gsal bar snang ba yin //
translated: At that time, it is a manifestation.

original: don snang ba ni med phyir ro //üîΩshes snang tha dad pa yis ni //
analyzed: don snang ba ni med phyir ro // shes snang tha dad pa yis ni //
translated: because the object does not appear.

original: don rnams khyad par byed pa yin //
analyzed: don rnams khyad par byed pa yin //
translated: The difference in the appearance of the object is due to the difference in the appearance of the cognition.

original: dbang po'i yul gyi don ni gsal bar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: dbang po'i yul gyi don ni gsal bar snang ba yin la /
translated: The object of the sense is the appearance of the object in a clear form.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la ni mi gsal bar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la ni mi gsal bar snang ba yin no //
translated: In the case of the hidden object, the appearance is not clear.

original: snang ba tha dad pa yin yang gcig pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa yin yang gcig pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: And the difference in the appearance is not the same.

original: gal te nye ba dang ring bar ngas pas shes pa'i snang ba gsal ba dang mi gsal bar tha dad kyang yul gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir snang ba tha dad pa tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te nye ba dang ring bar ngas pas shes pa'i snang ba gsal ba dang mi gsal bar tha dad kyang yul gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir snang ba tha dad pa tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If the difference in the appearance of the cognition is due to the difference in the near and the distant object, and if the object is one and the same, how can the appearance be different?

original: tha dad pa'i don byed pa tha dad pa las yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i don byed pa tha dad pa las yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na //
translated: The difference in the appearance is due to the difference in the function of the object.

original: don byed pa tha dad pa yang snang ba tha dad pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: don byed pa tha dad pa yang snang ba tha dad pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Is the difference in the function of the object not due to the difference in the appearance?

original: gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pas ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pas ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the effect is not the characteristic of the difference.

original: snang ba tha dad pa med par 'bras bu tha dad pas ni rgyu tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa med par 'bras bu tha dad pas ni rgyu tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The effect is not different from the cause because of the difference of the effect.

original: snang ba tha dad pa yang yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa yang yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But there is a difference of appearance.

original: 'o na ni de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pas ci bya /
analyzed: 'o na ni de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pas ci bya /
translated: Then, because of that, there is a difference of the effect. What is the use of a difference of the effect?

original: gal te 'bras bu tha dad pas rgyu tha dad pa yin na 'bras bu tha dad pa gang las yin /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu tha dad pas rgyu tha dad pa yin na 'bras bu tha dad pa gang las yin /
translated: If the difference of the cause is because of the difference of the effect, from what is the difference of the effect?

original: 'bras bu gzhan tha dad pa las so zhe na thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan tha dad pa las so zhe na thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is from another effect, there is an infinite regress.

original: snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na ni rgyu yang de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pa ci zhig bya /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na ni rgyu yang de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pa ci zhig bya /
translated: If it is from a difference of appearance, then the cause is different from that, so what is the use of a difference of the effect?

original: don byed pas tha dad pas tha dad pa la yang snang ba tha dad pa de nyid tha dad par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: don byed pas tha dad pas tha dad pa la yang snang ba tha dad pa de nyid tha dad par byed pa yin te /
translated: If it is different because of the difference of the function, then the difference of appearance itself makes the difference,

original: gsal bar snang ba nyid don byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba nyid don byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the function is the appearance of the manifest.

original: de'i phyir yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i mi gsal bar snang ba ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i mi gsal bar snang ba ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of a distant object as indistinct is not a case of a thing as its object.

original: mi slu ba'i phyir yul gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mi slu ba'i phyir yul gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a single object because it is not deceptive,

original: de ni rjes su dpag pa la yang yod pa yin pas der yang snang ba tha dad pa 'ba' zhig gis tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni rjes su dpag pa la yang yod pa yin pas der yang snang ba tha dad pa 'ba' zhig gis tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then that is also the case with inference, so that even there, the difference would be only in the difference of appearance.

original: 'o na ni gang gi tshe mig mngon du phye bas de lta bu las brda byed pa de'i tshe sgra dngos po yul can du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni gang gi tshe mig mngon du phye bas de lta bu las brda byed pa de'i tshe sgra dngos po yul can du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that when the eye is open, the sound is a thing as its object,

original: 'dir gtan la dbab pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir gtan la dbab pa ni /
translated: then the conclusion is this:

original: mig la don snang ba na yang //
analyzed: mig la don snang ba na yang //
translated: Even when the eye perceives an object,

original: 'di zhes gzhan gyis bstan pa gang //
analyzed: 'di zhes gzhan gyis bstan pa gang //
translated: it is only when someone else points it out

original: de nyid sgra yis sbyor byed kyi //
analyzed: de nyid sgra yis sbyor byed kyi //
translated: that the sound is applied to it.

original: dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin no //
translated: It is not the domain of the sense faculty.

original: gal te mig dang rna ba dag la sgra dang bum ba la sogs pa snang ba de ltar yang rang gi ngo bor snang ba tsam gyis ni 'brel pa ma yin gyi 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye bas
analyzed: gal te mig dang rna ba dag la sgra dang bum ba la sogs pa snang ba de ltar yang rang gi ngo bor snang ba tsam gyis ni 'brel pa ma yin gyi 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye bas
translated: If sound and a pot, etc. appear to the eye and ear, still, the mere appearance of their own nature is not a relation.

original: bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid sbyor @230a * //
analyzed: bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid sbyor @230a * //
translated: The teaching that this is the expression of that is the differentiation of the two.

original: ba yin na mngon sum la ni rnam par dbye ba'i don snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ba yin na mngon sum la ni rnam par dbye ba'i don snang ba ma yin te /
translated: But in direct perception, the object of differentiation does not appear,

original: don rkyang pa tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rkyang pa tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because only the mere object appears.

original: rnam par dbye ba'i don ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'i yul nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba'i don ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'i yul nyid de /
translated: The object of differentiation is the object of the appearance of conceptual thought.

original: 'di ltar / 'di'i zhes 'brel pa ni phan gdags bya 'dogs byed med par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdes na res 'ga' ni blo'i yul gyi don las sgra 'byung la /
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di'i zhes 'brel pa ni phan gdags bya 'dogs byed med par mi 'gyur ro // des na res 'ga' ni blo'i yul gyi don las sgra 'byung la /
translated: Thus, the relation ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù is not without the benefit of the expressed and the expresser.üîΩTherefore, sometimes the word arises from the object of the mind,

original: res 'ga' ni sgar las blo la gnas pa'i don yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni sgar las blo la gnas pa'i don yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and sometimes the object of the mind is from the word.

original: blo'i rang bzhin dang rnam par rig byed rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa la brten nas rnam par dbye ba 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin dang rnam par rig byed rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa la brten nas rnam par dbye ba 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The division of cognition is based on the relation of cause and effect, which is the nature of cognition and the form of representation.

original: mngon sum la snang pa'i rgyu mtshan / ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum la snang pa'i rgyu mtshan / ma yin te /
translated: It is not the reason for the appearance in perception,

original: de med par yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists even when that does not.

original: gal te mig la sogs pas bskyed pa la snang ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed pa yin na ni de'i tshe de nyid kyis snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pas bskyed pa la snang ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed pa yin na ni de'i tshe de nyid kyis snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: If the representation of form and so on, which is produced by the eye and so on, is the appearance of the intrinsic identity of form and so on, then it would appear by that, but it does not.

original: dbang po'i bya ba med pa la //
analyzed: dbang po'i bya ba med pa la //
translated: Because the activity of the sense faculty is absent,

original: gzhan dag tsam gyis snang med phyir //
analyzed: gzhan dag tsam gyis snang med phyir //
translated: it does not appear by the mere other.

original: ci ste yang gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda med mod /
analyzed: ci ste yang gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda med mod /
translated: But if there is no convention regarding the intrinsic identity,

original: de lta na yang de nyid brjod bya yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de lta na yang de nyid brjod bya yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
translated: then what is the contradiction in saying that it is the object of expression?

original: 'brel pa ma byas can min te //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma byas can min te //
translated: It is not without a relation,

original: rang nyid shes par thal phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid shes par thal phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it is known by itself.

original: yang na gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed na ci ltar spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: yang na gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed na ci ltar spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: Or, if a convention is made in regard to intrinsic identity, how could a universal be understood?

original: de lta bu nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is just like that,

original: de la bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de la bshad pa ni /
translated: then the response is as follows.

original: 'brel par ma byas can zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel par ma byas can zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIt is not related to that which is not expressed.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa ni 'brel pa med par brjod bya ma yin pa kho na shes pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa ni 'brel pa med par brjod bya ma yin pa kho na shes pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since a sense consciousness is a consciousness of that which is not related to what is not expressed, it is non-conceptual.

original: 'o na ji ltar 'di ba lang zhes bya ba dang / spu la sbrul snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gsal bar snang bar rtogs 'dir rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan nyid do zhes bya bar ni nus pa ma yin te /üîΩ'dzin par byed pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'di ba lang zhes bya ba dang / spu la sbrul snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gsal bar snang bar rtogs 'dir rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan nyid do zhes bya bar ni nus pa ma yin te / 'dzin par byed pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But how is it that this consciousness appears clearly in the aspect of a cow, or in the aspect of a snake in a rope? It is not possible to say that it is a conceptual consciousness, because there is no apprehension of another.

original: 'di la rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba lkog tu gyur pa yang med de gsal ba dang cig shos kyi snang ba gnyis rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di la rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba lkog tu gyur pa yang med de gsal ba dang cig shos kyi snang ba gnyis rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And in this case there is no hidden object of a conceptual consciousness, because it would follow that the appearance of the other, the clear object, would be realized.

original: 'on te sngar rnam par mi rtog pa yang de snang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on te sngar rnam par mi rtog pa yang de snang ba yin no //
translated: But if it is not a conceptual cognition, then it is not a cognition of that object.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i dus su gzung bar bya ba khyad par du yang gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i dus su gzung bar bya ba khyad par du yang gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin zhing //
translated: And at the time of conceptual cognition, the object is not qualified.

original: gzung ba khyad par du gyur pa ma yin na ni 'dzin par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gzung ba khyad par du gyur pa ma yin na ni 'dzin par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: And if the object is not qualified, how can it be apprehended?

original: de yang mi bden te /üîΩnges pa dang ni ma nges pa //
analyzed: de yang mi bden te / nges pa dang ni ma nges pa //
translated: This is not correct.üîΩBecause of the perception of a difference

original: nyid kyis khyad par dmigs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nyid kyis khyad par dmigs pa'i phyir //
translated: between the certain and the uncertain,

original: ji ltar 'dir khyad med 'gyur te //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir khyad med 'gyur te //
translated: how can there be no difference here?

original: mthong ba nyid ni mi 'thad min //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni mi 'thad min //
translated: It is not that seeing itself is not tenable.üîΩIt is not the case that the object of negation is the cognition itself.üîΩBut the cognition that is to be known is not the object of negation.

original: shes par 'gyur ba nyid ni dgag pa'i @230b yul ma yin no //üîΩrnam par rtog pas shes par 'gyur ba ni mi bden pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: shes par 'gyur ba nyid ni dgag pa'i @230b yul ma yin no // rnam par rtog pas shes par 'gyur ba ni mi bden pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: The cognition that is to be known is not the object of negation.

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: bden min nyid ni ga las grub //
analyzed: bden min nyid ni ga las grub //
translated: How is it established that it is not true?

original: rnam rtog phyir na 'dir tshad gang //
analyzed: rnam rtog phyir na 'dir tshad gang //
translated: Because of conceptual thought, what is the valid cognition here?

original: rnam rtog med pa'i blo la yang //
analyzed: rnam rtog med pa'i blo la yang //
translated: Even for a nonconceptual mind,

original: mi bden nyid ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: mi bden nyid ni brjod par bya //
translated: the falsity itself should be stated.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de tsam nyid kyis ni mi bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de tsam nyid kyis ni mi bden pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that just because it is conceptual it is not true.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang mi bden par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang mi bden par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For, it follows that the nonconceptual is not true.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that is not so because it is nonconceptual,

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
translated: then there is no difference, because that is the same for the conceptual.

original: gzhan yang / mngon sum du byed pa ji ltar mi bden pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang / mngon sum du byed pa ji ltar mi bden pa yin /
translated: Moreover, how can the actualization be untrue?

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni nges pa med pa yin pas mi bden pa nyid du srid kyang //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni nges pa med pa yin pas mi bden pa nyid du srid kyang //
translated: Since the nonconceptual is indeterminate, it is possible that it is not true.

original: nges pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa go mi bden pa nyid du ji ltar dogs /
analyzed: nges pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa go mi bden pa nyid du ji ltar dogs /
translated: But how can the actualization of the nature of the determinate be suspected of not being true?

original: 'on te nges pa 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te nges pa 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that this determination is inference,

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: that is not true.

original: yul ni lkog tu ma gyur pas //
analyzed: yul ni lkog tu ma gyur pas //
translated: The object is not hidden,

original: rjes dpag srid pa min phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes dpag srid pa min phyir ro //
translated: because inference is not possible.

original: yul gyi dbye ba nyid las ni //
analyzed: yul gyi dbye ba nyid las ni //
translated: From the division of the object itself,

original: tshad ma'i dbye ba sgrub phyir te //üîΩtshad ma nges pa med pa nyid //
analyzed: tshad ma'i dbye ba sgrub phyir te // tshad ma nges pa med pa nyid //
translated: Because of the division of valid cognition,üîΩbecause of establishing the absence of valid cognition,

original: min par sgrub par byed phyir ro //
analyzed: min par sgrub par byed phyir ro //
translated: because of establishing the absence of valid cognition.

original: zhe na / de thams cad ni bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: zhe na / de thams cad ni bden pa ma yin te /
translated: All of that is not true.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //üîΩcig car bu ni 'jug phyir ram //
