analyzed: 'di ltar / rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid // cig car bu ni 'jug phyir ram //
translated: Because the conceptual and non-conceptual mindüîΩsimultaneously engage,üîΩor because engagement is swift,

original: 'jug pa myur phyir blun po dag / de dag la ni gcig tu zhe na //
analyzed: 'jug pa myur phyir blun po dag / de dag la ni gcig tu zhe na //
translated: the foolish think they are one.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ba la sogs pa'i yi ger nges pa can rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa yin na ni mngon sum gyis shes pa 'di ni gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhes bya bar
analyzed: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ba la sogs pa'i yi ger nges pa can rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa yin na ni mngon sum gyis shes pa 'di ni gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhes bya bar
translated: If the conceptual thought that thinks ‚Äúcow‚Äù is able to apprehend the specific characteristics of the letters such as ‚Äúba,‚Äù then this would be understood as ‚Äúthis cognition is one that is conceptual.‚Äù

original: rig par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: rig par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: However, that is not the case.

original: gang gi phyir yi ge'i rnam par 'dzin pa thams cad ni sngon mthong ba'i stobs las byung ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon sad pa las yi ge mi gsal bar snang bar rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yi ge'i rnam par 'dzin pa thams cad ni sngon mthong ba'i stobs las byung ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon sad pa las yi ge mi gsal bar snang bar rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Because all apprehensions of letters are understood to be the appearance of unclear letters, arising from the activation of the seed of the instinctual habit generated by the power of previous experience.

original: de'i phyir gzhan kho na yin la mdun na 'dug pa'i ka ba gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan kho na yin la mdun na 'dug pa'i ka ba gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that clearly perceives the pillar in front of one is direct perception.

original: de la ni rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir 'di nyid mngon sum gyi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ni rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir 'di nyid mngon sum gyi shes pa yin no //
translated: Because it has no discursive thought, it is direct perception.

original: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can it be ascertained as one?

original: med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: med pa kho na'o //
translated: It is not at all.

original: re zhig 'di ni ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa ni khra bo dang ba lang la sogs pa'i yi ge rnam pa gcig tu zhen pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig 'di ni ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa ni khra bo dang ba lang la sogs pa'i yi ge rnam pa gcig tu zhen pa ma yin te /
translated: The consciousness that thinks ‚ÄúThis is a cow‚Äù does not ascertain the letters ‚Äúgo‚Äù and ‚Äúva‚Äù as one.

original: snang ba tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that the appearance is different.

original: yi ge ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang gcig gi ngo bo nyid ma yin no /
analyzed: yi ge ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang gcig gi ngo bo nyid ma yin no /
translated: The successive thoughts of the letters, etc., also do not have the nature of one.

original: @231a * // yi ge snang ba'i shes pa nyid ni khra bo la dmigs pa ma yin te de med kyang khra bor snang ba'i phyir dang / yi ger snang ba de yang mig btsums pa la yang snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @231a * // yi ge snang ba'i shes pa nyid ni khra bo la dmigs pa ma yin te de med kyang khra bor snang ba'i phyir dang / yi ger snang ba de yang mig btsums pa la yang snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The consciousness to which the letters appear is not the objective reference of the variegated, because the variegated appears even when it does not exist, and because the appearance of the letters also appears even when the eyes are closed.

original: de med kyang snang ba ni ma nges pa'i bdag nyid yin la nges pa ni de las khyad par du gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de med kyang snang ba ni ma nges pa'i bdag nyid yin la nges pa ni de las khyad par du gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the appearance even when it does not exist is the nature of the indeterminate, and that the determinate is distinguished from that,

original: nges pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin ;
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin ;
translated: what is this so-called determinate?

original: rang bzhin gsal bar snang ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin gsal bar snang ba'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the clear appearance of the nature,

original: ma yin te sngon nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te sngon nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not so, because it appears even before.

original: sngon gyi rang bzhin nyid du snang ba na rnam pa gzhan de nyid mi gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi rang bzhin nyid du snang ba na rnam pa gzhan de nyid mi gsal ba yin no //
translated: When it appears as the nature of the past, it is not the clear appearance of another aspect.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gzhan snang ba na gzhan nges pa zhes bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gzhan snang ba na gzhan nges pa zhes bya /
translated: Therefore, how can it be called the determination of another when another aspect appears?

original: de dang gcig tu nges par byas pa'i phyir nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dang gcig tu nges par byas pa'i phyir nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is certain that they are one, and therefore they are ascertained as one.

original: tha dad par snang bdag la gcig tu nges pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: tha dad par snang bdag la gcig tu nges pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can it be true that what appears as different is ascertained as one?

original: 'o na gcig nyid kyi tha snyad ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gcig nyid kyi tha snyad ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How then is the convention of one established?

original: 'bras bu 'jug pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis ni de gcig tu zhen pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'jug pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis ni de gcig tu zhen pa yin no //
translated: Because they are the same in engaging the effect. By being the same in having one effect, they are conceived as one.

original: 'o na rim gyis 'dzin par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rim gyis 'dzin par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that they are not apprehended in sequence?

original: yul cig car nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul cig car nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the object is present simultaneously.

original: yi ger rnam par rtog pa'i dus su mngon sum gyi shes pa'i don nye bar mi gnas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yi ger rnam par rtog pa'i dus su mngon sum gyi shes pa'i don nye bar mi gnas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: When the letters are imagined, the object of the direct perception is not absent.

original: yang na khyed kyi yul nye ba na myur du 'jug pa'i phyir rim gyis 'dzin par nges pa ma yin pa de bzhin du kho bo cag gis 'dzin pa yang yin pas khyad par med do //
analyzed: yang na khyed kyi yul nye ba na myur du 'jug pa'i phyir rim gyis 'dzin par nges pa ma yin pa de bzhin du kho bo cag gis 'dzin pa yang yin pas khyad par med do //
translated: Or, just as for you, the object is apprehended without certainty in sequence because it engages quickly when it is present, so for us, there is no difference, because it is apprehended.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa gzhan nyid yin na ji ltar de'i yul brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin mi gsal ba nyid du snang bar ma gyur /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa gzhan nyid yin na ji ltar de'i yul brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin mi gsal ba nyid du snang bar ma gyur /
translated: If conceptualization is different, then how is it that the object of that conceptualization appears as if it were not clearly manifest?

original: de la yul gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de la yul gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBecause there is no other object,‚Äù

original: 'o na ni der yul med pa zhugs pas de bar du bcad pa na /
analyzed: 'o na ni der yul med pa zhugs pas de bar du bcad pa na /
translated: then, since there is no object there, the object is obstructed.

original: mthong ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThe seeing is interrupted,‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: bar du bcad pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bar du bcad pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because there is no obstruction.

original: dus mnyam pas ni bar du gcod pa mi srid do //üîΩgzhan yang / gal te rnam rtog gis bcad pas //
analyzed: dus mnyam pas ni bar du gcod pa mi srid do // gzhan yang / gal te rnam rtog gis bcad pas //
translated: It is impossible for something simultaneous to obstruct.üîΩMoreover, if you say, ‚ÄúThe seeing is interrupted

original: mthong ba rgyun chad 'gyur zhe na //üîΩgzhan gyi'ang rigs ni tha dad pa'i //
analyzed: mthong ba rgyun chad 'gyur zhe na // gzhan gyi'ang rigs ni tha dad pa'i //
translated: because of the obstruction of conceptualization,‚ÄùüîΩthen why is it not so for others,

original: rnam par rtog tshe ji ltar min //
analyzed: rnam par rtog tshe ji ltar min //
translated: when conceptualization is different?

original: mngon sum gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun chad pa med de /
analyzed: mngon sum gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun chad pa med de /
translated: In the case of a single perception that is associated with conceptualization, there is no interruption.

original: de nyid kyi bar du gcod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bar du gcod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is obstructed by that itself.

original: rnam par rtog par med par smra ba la ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan kho na yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par med par smra ba la ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan kho na yin te /
translated: But for those who maintain that there is no conceptual thought, it is a different conceptual thought that is the obstruction.

original: des na bar du gcod do zhe na /
analyzed: des na bar du gcod do zhe na /
translated: Thus, it is an obstruction.

original: rigs mi gcig pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba'i tshe don gzhan mthong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs mi gcig pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba'i tshe don gzhan mthong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But how could the continuum of seeing another object occur when a conceptual thought of a different type arises?

original: rigs mi gcig pa'i rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi gcig pa'i rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin te /
translated: A conceptual thought of a different type is not the nature of a perceptual cognition of another object,

original: gzhan la snang ba'i rang bzhin du rnam par @231b rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la snang ba'i rang bzhin du rnam par @231b rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a conceptual thought does not have the nature of appearing as another object.

original: ci ste de la rgyun chad pa ni yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ste de la rgyun chad pa ni yod pa kho na'o //
translated: But if there is a break in the continuum,

original: 'on kyang mthong ba'i dngos po stobs dang ldan pas rab tu zhugs pa'i mthong ba ma yin pas bsgribs pa ni rang gi tha snyad mi mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang mthong ba'i dngos po stobs dang ldan pas rab tu zhugs pa'i mthong ba ma yin pas bsgribs pa ni rang gi tha snyad mi mthong ba yin te /
translated: then the seeing that is engaged by the power of the object is not obscured, and one does not see one‚Äôs own conventions.

original: des na rgyun chad pa med par zhen pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na rgyun chad pa med par zhen pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, there is no break in the continuum, and one is attached.

original: de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: 'di ltar / gal te mgal me mthong ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te mgal me mthong ba bzhin //
translated: Because: If it is like seeing a firebrand

original: dngos phyogs stobs dang ldan 'dod na //
analyzed: dngos phyogs stobs dang ldan 'dod na //
translated: If you maintain that the object is powerful,

original: de ni gzhan la'ang mtshungs pa yin //
analyzed: de ni gzhan la'ang mtshungs pa yin //
translated: then that is the same for others.

original: yi ge'ang cig car thos par 'gyur //üîΩgal te rnam par rtog pa rigs mtshungs kyang dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa yin na /
analyzed: yi ge'ang cig car thos par 'gyur // gal te rnam par rtog pa rigs mtshungs kyang dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa yin na /
translated: The letters are also heard simultaneously.üîΩIf you maintain that the object is powerful, then that is the same for those who maintain that there is no conceptual differentiation.

original: rnam par rtog pa med par smra ba la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bar du chod pa ma yin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par smra ba la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bar du chod pa ma yin pas skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault because there is no obstruction.

original: 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod par zad do //
analyzed: 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod par zad do //
translated: This is merely a statement of your opinion.

original: bar du gcod pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa ni mi srid do //
translated: Obstruction is impossible.

original: myur ba'i phyir na bar du chod pa la yang bar mchod par shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: myur ba'i phyir na bar du chod pa la yang bar mchod par shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the cognition of an object is obstructed because of its speed,

original: gang gi phyir myur ba'i phyir na myur bar brjod pa'i yi ge dag kyang dus gcig tu thos par thal bar 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir myur ba'i phyir na myur bar brjod pa'i yi ge dag kyang dus gcig tu thos par thal bar 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: because if that were so, then the letters of a word that is spoken quickly would be heard simultaneously, but that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir myur ba ni 'dir rim pa dang ldan pa la yang bar du mchod par snang ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir myur ba ni 'dir rim pa dang ldan pa la yang bar du mchod par snang ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, speed is not the cause of the appearance of an obstruction in a sequence.

original: ci ste de la ni myur ba nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste de la ni myur ba nyid med pa yin te /
translated: But if it is not, then it is not rapid.

original: des na dus gcig tu thos pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na dus gcig tu thos pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not heard at one time.

original: 'dir myur ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ga las yid dag tu gcig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir myur ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ga las yid dag tu gcig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Here, it is not rapid, because there is no engagement in one place.

original: 'di ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: de lta ma yin na cig car du rtogs pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na cig car du rtogs pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, there would be no understanding of the word at one time.

original: cig car ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig car ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is simultaneous.

original: 'o na autpala'i 'dab ma brgya phigs pa yang cig car nyid du 'gyur bas rim par brtags pa ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na autpala'i 'dab ma brgya phigs pa yang cig car nyid du 'gyur bas rim par brtags pa ci bya zhe na /
translated: But then the breaking of a hundred petals of an utpala flower would be simultaneous. What is the use of examining it in sequence?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de la ni rim gyis yul du phyin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ni rim gyis yul du phyin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: because in that case, it is understood by inference, since it arrives at the object in sequence.

original: 'di ni de ltar rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir rim par rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ni de ltar rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir rim par rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: But how can this be understood in sequence, since there is no inference of it in that way?

original: rim yang med par rtog pa la rgyu ci yod ce na /
analyzed: rim yang med par rtog pa la rgyu ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the cause of the idea that there is no sequence?

original: mngon sum gyi bdag nyid kyi snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bdag nyid kyi snang ba nyid do //
translated: It is the appearance itself, which has the nature of direct perception.

original: mngon sum du snang ba las gzhan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du snang ba las gzhan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that the cognition of the object is due to something other than the direct perception of the object.üîΩThe reason for the simultaneous hearing of the previously mentioned letters is the speed of the cause.

original: sngar brjod pa'i yi ge cig car thos pa'i rgyu mgyogs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa de la brjod pa /
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i yi ge cig car thos pa'i rgyu mgyogs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa de la brjod pa /
translated: The same is said here:

original: 'dir don kun dang cig car du //
analyzed: 'dir don kun dang cig car du //
translated: When all the objects are present,

original: 'dus can dbang rnams yod pa na //
analyzed: 'dus can dbang rnams yod pa na //
translated: and the sense faculties are present,

original: lnga po rnams kyis chod na yang //
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyis chod na yang //
translated: even when the five are obstructed,

original: chod med bzhin du snang ba'i blo //
analyzed: chod med bzhin du snang ba'i blo //
translated: the cognition appears as if unobstructed.

original: gang de ming gi mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: gang de ming gi mthar thug pa'i //
translated: That is the limit of the name,

original: shes pa'i skad cig dang 'dres phyir //
analyzed: shes pa'i skad cig dang 'dres phyir //
translated: because it is mixed with the moment of cognition.

original: chod par snang ba de ngo mtshar //
analyzed: chod par snang ba de ngo mtshar //
translated: The appearance of obstruction is amazing!

original: de phyir blo ni cig car 'gyur //
analyzed: de phyir blo ni cig car 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, the cognition is simultaneous.

original: gang zhig blo cig car skye ba ni med do //
analyzed: gang zhig blo cig car skye ba ni med do //
translated: There is no simultaneous arising of cognition.

original: gang du cig car 'byung bar @232a * //
analyzed: gang du cig car 'byung bar @232a * //
translated: Where there is the conception of simultaneous arising,

original: zhen pa der ni myur du 'jug pa las rgyu gzhan med de /
analyzed: zhen pa der ni myur du 'jug pa las rgyu gzhan med de /
translated: there is no other cause for the rapid engagement than that.

original: de ltar lhag par zhen pa ni mgyogs par 'jug pa las yin no zhes 'dod pa de la 'di skad brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar lhag par zhen pa ni mgyogs par 'jug pa las yin no zhes 'dod pa de la 'di skad brjod do //
translated: Thus, the conception of rapidity is from the conception of speed.

original: yi ge skyen par brjod pa la yang ji ltar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yi ge skyen par brjod pa la yang ji ltar mi 'gyur /
translated: Why is it not the same for the rapid pronunciation of syllables?

original: gal te de lta bu'i mgyogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin nam zhe na /üîΩ'o na 'dir yang de bas kyang mgyogs pa ches shas chung ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i mgyogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin nam zhe na / 'o na 'dir yang de bas kyang mgyogs pa ches shas chung ba yin te /
translated: If you say that it is not the same because there is no such rapidity,

original: gang du yul lnga nye bar gnas pa dang / rnam par rtog pa nus pa dang ldan par gyur pa /
analyzed: gang du yul lnga nye bar gnas pa dang / rnam par rtog pa nus pa dang ldan par gyur pa /
translated: then here too, it is even more rapid, for the five sense consciousnesses are more rapid than the mental consciousness.

original: dper na dri zhim zhing blta na sdug pa'i na chung gi kha'i ro myong ba glu snyan pa la rna gtod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na dri zhim zhing blta na sdug pa'i na chung gi kha'i ro myong ba glu snyan pa la rna gtod pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, when a young woman, beautiful and fragrant, kisses a man, and he hears the sweet sound of music,

original: der ni sems re re yang lngas bar du chod pa yin no //
analyzed: der ni sems re re yang lngas bar du chod pa yin no //
translated: there, each mental consciousness is separated from the preceding mental consciousness by five sense consciousnesses.

original: 'dir ches mgyogs pa shas chung ba de 'dra ba yin mod kyi de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang ba de bzhin du yi ge rnams la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ches mgyogs pa shas chung ba de 'dra ba yin mod kyi de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang ba de bzhin du yi ge rnams la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, it is true that it is even more rapid, but nevertheless, it appears as if it grasps all at once, and the same would be true for the syllables.

original: gang du lngas bar du chod kyang cig car du zhen pa sgrub par nus pa'i mgyogs pas /
analyzed: gang du lngas bar du chod kyang cig car du zhen pa sgrub par nus pa'i mgyogs pas /
translated: Where it is separated by five, it is able to establish a simultaneous adherence by the rapidity of its functioning.

original: yi ge'i yul can skad cig shes pas bar mchod pa der ji ltar nus par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yi ge'i yul can skad cig shes pas bar mchod pa der ji ltar nus par mi 'gyur /
translated: How could it be possible for a momentary consciousness, the subject of letters, to be interrupted there?

original: de'i phyir blo ni cig car kho na skye bar rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir blo ni cig car kho na skye bar rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is logical that the mind arises only instantaneously.

original: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba bsgrub par mi nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba bsgrub par mi nus pa kho na'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be impossible to establish the contradiction.üîΩTherefore, this is correct:

original: des na / rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
analyzed: des na / rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind with conception and without conception

original: cig car du ni 'jug phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: cig car du ni 'jug phyir ro // zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no //
translated: arises simultaneously.‚ÄùüîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / snang ba la yang khyad med na //
analyzed: gzhan yang / snang ba la yang khyad med na //
translated: if there is no difference in appearance,

original: bar bcas bar med ci ltar yin //
analyzed: bar bcas bar med ci ltar yin //
translated: how can there be an interval or no interval?

original: yid kyi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la //
analyzed: yid kyi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la //
translated: The mind with conception

original: rim du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: would not grasp in sequence.

original: la lar ni bar dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: la lar ni bar dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: In some cases, there is an interval,

original: gang du rigs mi mthun pas bar du bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gang du rigs mi mthun pas bar du bcas pa'o //
translated: where there is an interval of a different type.

original: la lar ni bar chad med pa yin te /
analyzed: la lar ni bar chad med pa yin te /
translated: In some cases, there is no interval,

original: rigs mi mthun ba'i rnam par rtog pas bar du ma bcas pas so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun ba'i rnam par rtog pas bar du ma bcas pas so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: where there is no interval of a different type of conception.

original: bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa de dag gal te snang ba khyad par med na ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa de dag gal te snang ba khyad par med na ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the appearance is not different in the case of those with obstacles and those without obstacles, how is it that

original: yid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa de'i yang rim pa dang ldan par snang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa de'i yang rim pa dang ldan par snang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: the stream of mental conceptions alone does not appear in order,

original: mgyogs par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mgyogs par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they arise quickly?

original: gal te rnam par shes pa cig car 'byung na res 'ga' don tshogs kyang 'dzin pa med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa cig car 'byung na res 'ga' don tshogs kyang 'dzin pa med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If consciousnesses arise simultaneously, how is it that sometimes a group of objects is not apprehended?üîΩIn response to this,

original: 'di la lan du /üîΩla lar kun tu chags sems can //
analyzed: 'di la lan du / la lar kun tu chags sems can //
translated: it is said:üîΩWhen there is a mind of attachment

original: don nye ba la'ang 'dzin med gang //
analyzed: don nye ba la'ang 'dzin med gang //
translated: to an object, sometimes it is not apprehended.

original: chags pas gzhan skyed nus nyams phyir //
analyzed: chags pas gzhan skyed nus nyams phyir //
translated: Because the capacity to generate another is impaired by attachment.

original: gnyi ga la yang rtsod 'di yod //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang rtsod 'di yod //
translated: This is a dispute in both cases.

original: gzhan la chags pas nus pa nyams par 'gyur ba yin na ni shes pa de nye bar gnas pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i de ma thag rkyen du mi @232b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la chags pas nus pa nyams par 'gyur ba yin na ni shes pa de nye bar gnas pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i de ma thag rkyen du mi @232b 'gyur ro //
translated: If the capacity is impaired by attachment to another, then that consciousness that is present will not be the immediately preceding condition that generates consciousness.

original: gnyi ga la brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga la brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yang yin no //
translated: The objection and the examination are the same in both cases.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not the same.

original: gcig kho na la yid kyi nus pa yod pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gcig kho na la yid kyi nus pa yod pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Because the mental power is in one alone.

original: de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But in that case, the object would appear to be grasped all at once.

original: gang la cher chags pa med pa de la 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gang la cher chags pa med pa de la 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But it is not so grasped where there is no strong attachment.

original: kho bo cag kyang de skad smra ste /
analyzed: kho bo cag kyang de skad smra ste /
translated: We say the same thing.

original: gang du chags pa der rim gyis 'dzin la /
analyzed: gang du chags pa der rim gyis 'dzin la /
translated: Where there is attachment, the object is grasped successively;

original: gzhan du ni cig car ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni cig car ro //
translated: but elsewhere, it is grasped all at once.

original: thams cad du rim gyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ni tshad ma med do //
analyzed: thams cad du rim gyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ni tshad ma med do //
translated: But there is no proof that the object is always grasped successively.

original: rnam par shes pa snga ma las ma gtogs pa yid gzhan ni tshad ma'i yul du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa snga ma las ma gtogs pa yid gzhan ni tshad ma'i yul du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: There is no other mental faculty apart from the preceding consciousness, and it is not a valid source of knowledge.

original: gal te mgal me rim gyis 'dzin pa yin yang cig car du snang ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mgal me rim gyis 'dzin pa yin yang cig car du snang ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt a firebrand perceived all at once, even though it is grasped successively?

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: No, that is not true.

original: der rim gyis snang ba mtshams sbyar bas blo der 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang der ni cig car kho na snang ba yin no //
analyzed: der rim gyis snang ba mtshams sbyar bas blo der 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang der ni cig car kho na snang ba yin no //
translated: But the mind does not change in that way, and the object appears all at once.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / mgal me la sogs myur 'jug pa'i //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mgal me la sogs myur 'jug pa'i //
translated: The appearance of a wheel from a firebrand

original: rjes su 'gro bas gnod pa can //üîΩmig las 'khor lor 'khrul skye'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bas gnod pa can // mig las 'khor lor 'khrul skye'o //
translated: is due to the defect of the rapid movementüîΩof the firebrand, not from the connection

original: de mthong mtshams sbyor bas ma yin //
analyzed: de mthong mtshams sbyor bas ma yin //
translated: of the appearance of the wheel.

original: myur du bskor ba'i mgal me'i skad cig rnams kyi rjes su 'gro bas nyams par byas pa'i mig nyid kyis 'khor lor snang ba blo skyed par byed kyi /
analyzed: myur du bskor ba'i mgal me'i skad cig rnams kyi rjes su 'gro bas nyams par byas pa'i mig nyid kyis 'khor lor snang ba blo skyed par byed kyi /
translated: The mind is produced by the appearance of a wheel due to the defect of the eye itself, which is affected by the rapid movement of the successive instants of the firebrand.

original: dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa ni yid kyi shes pa de ltar gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa ni yid kyi shes pa de ltar gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the powerful side of the object is not the mental consciousness that is affected in that way.

original: ci ste na yang yul lnga nye bar gnas pa ni cig car snang ba ni 'khrul pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste na yang yul lnga nye bar gnas pa ni cig car snang ba ni 'khrul pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the five objects are present, the simultaneous appearance is just an error.

original: 'o na ni thams cad du ni cig car snang ba 'khrul pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni thams cad du ni cig car snang ba 'khrul pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, in all cases, the simultaneous appearance would be just an error.

original: 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But we accept that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, we do not accept that.

original: 'khrul pa nyid la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no valid cognition in error itself.

original: cig car snang ba nyid ni 'khrul pa med pa'i mngon sum gyi rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: cig car snang ba nyid ni 'khrul pa med pa'i mngon sum gyi rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The simultaneous appearance of the five objects is the realization of nonerroneous perception.

original: gnod par byed pa med kyang de ltar snang ba de 'khrul pa yin na ni shes pa thams cad de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa med kyang de ltar snang ba de 'khrul pa yin na ni shes pa thams cad de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that appearance without an object of harm were error, it would follow that all consciousnesses are like that.

original: des na gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir cig car dmigs pa'i shes pa lnga po cig car nyid yin no zhes 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir cig car dmigs pa'i shes pa lnga po cig car nyid yin no zhes 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because there is no object of harm, it is established that the five consciousnesses that simultaneously observe are simultaneous.

original: des na mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, perception is only nonconceptual.

original: da ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa nye bar bkod de 'gog par byed do //
analyzed: da ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa nye bar bkod de 'gog par byed do //
translated: Now, he presents the assertions of others and refutes them.

original: la la dbang skyes la sogs phyir //
analyzed: la la dbang skyes la sogs phyir //
translated: Some say that because of the eye faculty and so on,üîΩit is nonconceptual like the mind of a child,

original: byis pa'i blo bzhin rtog med dang ; / byis pa'i rtog med nyid kyi rgyu //
analyzed: byis pa'i blo bzhin rtog med dang ; / byis pa'i rtog med nyid kyi rgyu //
translated: and the cause of a child‚Äôs nonconceptuality

original: brda nyams pa nyid yin smra pa //
analyzed: brda nyams pa nyid yin smra pa //
translated: is the loss of the capacity to make symbolic references.

original: gzhan dag mngon sum ni rtog pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag mngon sum ni rtog pa med pa yin te /
translated: Others say that perception is nonconceptual.

original: dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i phyir dang / yid ma yin pa'i phyir byis pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang / nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i phyir dang / yid ma yin pa'i phyir byis pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin no //
translated: because it arises from the sense faculty, because it engages through the aspect of experience, and because it is not conceptual, like the consciousness of a child.

original: byis pa'i dbang po'i rnam @233a * //üîΩpar shes pa rtog pa med pa nyid ni brda 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba /
analyzed: byis pa'i dbang po'i rnam @233a * // par shes pa rtog pa med pa nyid ni brda 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba /
translated: The nonconceptual consciousness of a childüîΩcannot apprehend a convention because it is not able to apprehend a convention.

original: de dag gi ni rtog med phyir //
analyzed: de dag gi ni rtog med phyir //
translated: Because of the absence of conceptualization,

original: byis pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: byis pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur //
translated: the consciousness of a child would be perception.

original: brda yi rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: brda yi rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is devoid of the cause of a convention,

original: de ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not become a convention later.

original: de skad smras pa de dag gi ltar na byis pa dag ni mngon sum kho na 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de skad smras pa de dag gi ltar na byis pa dag ni mngon sum kho na 'gyur mod /
translated: If that were so, then children would be perception.

original: byis pa la ni thams cad rtog pa med par 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: byis pa la ni thams cad rtog pa med par 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But it is maintained that all children are nonconceptual.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: byis pa la yang rang gi don bya ba la snga ma dang phyi mar rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byis pa la yang rang gi don bya ba la snga ma dang phyi mar rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: Even for children, there is conceptualization in the prior and subsequent moments in the performance of their own actions.

original: ci ste de'i tshe med na ni phyis kyang rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste de'i tshe med na ni phyis kyang rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it does not exist at that time, then later on also it would not be conceptual,

original: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no means of holding the sign.

original: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs ni rnam par rtog pa yin pa de ni byis pa la med do //üîΩ'on te gal te brda la ma byang ba'i //
analyzed: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs ni rnam par rtog pa yin pa de ni byis pa la med do // 'on te gal te brda la ma byang ba'i //
translated: The means of holding the sign is conceptualization, and that does not exist for the immature.üîΩIf the immature have a mind that is not trained in signs,

original: yid yod des na de 'dod na //
analyzed: yid yod des na de 'dod na //
translated: then you should accept that

original: de bzhin dbang skyes la yang 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang skyes la yang 'gyur //
translated: it is the same for those born blind.

original: 'di 'dra 'di yang lhag ldan yin //
analyzed: 'di 'dra 'di yang lhag ldan yin //
translated: This is also an additional point.

original: gal te byis pa rnams kyi yid kyi tha snyad byed pa de'i phyir byis pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te byis pa rnams kyi yid kyi tha snyad byed pa de'i phyir byis pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa yod pa yin no //
translated: If the immature have a mind that engages in verbal conventions, then the immature have analysis.

original: des na brda 'dzin pa'i phyir phyis yid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na brda 'dzin pa'i phyir phyis yid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, later on, the mind becomes conceptual because it holds the sign.

original: gal te de ltar na ni dbang po las skyes pa la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de ltar na ni dbang po las skyes pa la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then it would be the same for those born blind.

original: dbang po las skyes pa yang phyis rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba cis zlog par byed //
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa yang phyis rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba cis zlog par byed //
translated: How can you stop the claim that what is born from the sense faculties later becomes conceptual?

original: byis pa'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de yang brda 'dzin par nus pa med pa ga las yin /
analyzed: byis pa'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de yang brda 'dzin par nus pa med pa ga las yin /
translated: How could the sense consciousnesses of a child be incapable of apprehending symbols?

original: dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Because they arise from the child‚Äôs sense faculties.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not so, because there is no connection.

original: gzhan yang gal te byis pa'i dbang po las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa yin du chug kyang /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te byis pa'i dbang po las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa yin du chug kyang /
translated: Moreover, even if it were the case that the conceptual consciousnesses of a child were to arise from the child‚Äôs sense faculties,

original: thams cad du de ltar 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
analyzed: thams cad du de ltar 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
translated: why would it be necessary for all conceptual consciousnesses to be like that?

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas 'brel ba grub pa med par dpe tsam gyis ni gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas 'brel ba grub pa med par dpe tsam gyis ni gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Without the establishment of a connection by a valid cognition that refutes the opposite, a mere example does not prove the entailment of the reason.

original: ci ste gang zhig dbang po las skyes pa de ni nye ba tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin pas snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gang zhig dbang po las skyes pa de ni nye ba tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin pas snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúThat which arises from the sense faculties apprehends only what is near. Therefore, because it is devoid of the apprehension of what is sequential, it is nonconceptual,‚Äù

original: 'di snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'grub /
analyzed: 'di snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'grub /
translated: how is it established that it is devoid of the apprehension of what is sequential?

original: mngon sum du byed pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma de dag la med pa'i phyir dang / mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma de dag la med pa'i phyir dang / mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: because it is not the case that the former and latter are direct perception, and because that which is not direct perception

original: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: is not direct perception itself.

original: de lta na ni 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If that is so, then it is meaningless to say, ‚ÄúBecause it is a sense consciousness,

original: byis pa'i rnam par shes bzhin no //üîΩzhes bya ba don med pa yin no //
analyzed: byis pa'i rnam par shes bzhin no // zhes bya ba don med pa yin no //
translated: it is like the consciousness of a child.‚Äù

original: rtog pa med pa nyid ni mngon sum gyis grub par 'gyur te mngon sum du byed par so sor nges pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa nyid ni mngon sum gyis grub par 'gyur te mngon sum du byed par so sor nges pa nyid ni /
translated: The absence of conception is established by direct perception, and the ascertainment of the object of direct perception

original: mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is experienced by direct perception itself.üîΩIf that were not so, if direct perception were not the proof of the absence of conception, then how could inference engage in the wake of that?

original: de lta ma yin na gal te @233b gang du yang mngon sum rtog pa med pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rjes su dpag pa 'jug / ci ste byis pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon sum du byed
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te @233b gang du yang mngon sum rtog pa med pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rjes su dpag pa 'jug / ci ste byis pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon sum du byed
translated: If the consciousness of a child is direct perception,

original: pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa gzhan yang da lta bu nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa gzhan yang da lta bu nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, other sense consciousnesses are also present.

original: de lta na ni 'o na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na /
translated: If that is so, then

original: byis pa la sgrub gang yin pa //
analyzed: byis pa la sgrub gang yin pa //
translated: whatever is established for the childish

original: de nyid 'dir yang brjod bya ste //
analyzed: de nyid 'dir yang brjod bya ste //
translated: should be stated here as well,

original: dbang po'i blo ni mtshungs phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i blo ni mtshungs phyir ro //
translated: because the sense consciousnesses are the same.

original: 'dis ni myong sogs bshad pa yin //
analyzed: 'dis ni myong sogs bshad pa yin //
translated: This explains the experience, etc.

original: bskal ba la mngon du byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / gzhan la mthong ba'i phyir lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin no zhes spyir bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: bskal ba la mngon du byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / gzhan la mthong ba'i phyir lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin no zhes spyir bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is a direct perception because it is not a hidden object, since it does not see what is beyond the eon and sees other things. It is non-conceptual, as is generally established.

original: dbang po las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyis ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of the reason because it arises from the sense faculties?

original: mngon sum du byed pa ni de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa ni de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du brjod do //
translated: It is said that direct perception is non-conceptual.

original: rnam par rtog pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'gal bas khyab pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'gal bas khyab pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The reason is contradictory because the very conceptualization is contradictory with the direct perception that is to be established.üîΩOr, the reason is contradictory because the very nonconceptualization is contradictory with the conceptualization that is to be established.üîΩOr, the reason is contradictory because the very nonconceptualization is contradictory with the direct perception that is to be established.

original: yang na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa sgrub cing de las kyang mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: yang na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa sgrub cing de las kyang mngon sum nyid do //
translated: Or, the reason is contradictory because the very nonconceptualization is contradictory with the direct perception that is to be established.

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni mngon sum du byed pa sgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni mngon sum du byed pa sgrub pa yin la /
translated: If the very nonconceptualization establishes the direct perception,

original: des mngon sum nyid yin na zla ba gnyis la sogs pa rig pa rnams kyang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des mngon sum nyid yin na zla ba gnyis la sogs pa rig pa rnams kyang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the awareness of two moons and so on would also be direct perception.

original: ma 'khrul pa nyid yin na zhes rjod par byed pa yin na //
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa nyid yin na zhes rjod par byed pa yin na //
translated: If it is nonmistaken, it is direct perception.

original: gal te ma 'khrul pa nyid kyis chog mod rnam par rtog pa med pas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma 'khrul pa nyid kyis chog mod rnam par rtog pa med pas ci bya zhe na /
translated: If it is sufficient to be nonmistaken, what is the use of being nonconceptual?

original: khyad par ni gzhan la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ni gzhan la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For a distinction is made in dependence on something else.

original: de skad du yang mtshan nyid la gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas khyad par du byas so zhes bshad do ;
analyzed: de skad du yang mtshan nyid la gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas khyad par du byas so zhes bshad do ;
translated: Thus, in the discussion of the definition, the distinction is made in dependence on the other system.

original: / thams cad du yang rtog pa ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: / thams cad du yang rtog pa ni med pa nyid do //
translated: And in all cases, there is no conception.

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: All nonerroneous consciousnesses are nonconceptual.

original: 'khrul pa med pa nyid kyang slob dpon gyi dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa nyid kyang slob dpon gyi dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no //
translated: Nonerroneous is explained by the master as a specification.

original: yang na dbang po las brten pas ni mngon sum ste /
analyzed: yang na dbang po las brten pas ni mngon sum ste /
translated: Or, because it is based on the sense faculty, it is perception.

original: des ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid mtshon pa yin te /
translated: It is characterized as that which makes perceptible.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, all consciousnesses that operate by the mode of making perceptible are nonconceptual.

original: yang na 'jug par byed cing khyad par byed par phyir mngon sum yin la yul gyi rang bzhin la khyad par byed pa yang mngon du byed pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: yang na 'jug par byed cing khyad par byed par phyir mngon sum yin la yul gyi rang bzhin la khyad par byed pa yang mngon du byed pa kho na yin no //
translated: Or else, it is perception because it engages and distinguishes, and it is also the mere engagement of the nature of the object that is distinguished.

original: des dbang po las skyes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o//
analyzed: des dbang po las skyes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o//
translated: Thus, all that arises from the sense faculties is only non-conceptual.

original: @234a * // yang na slob dpon gyis ma 'khrul pa smos pa med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: @234a * // yang na slob dpon gyis ma 'khrul pa smos pa med pa kho na ste /
translated: Or else, the master did not mention non-erroneous because

original: rtog pa dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba kho na mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba kho na mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: the definition is only free from conceptuality.

original: 'o na ji ltar 'khrul pa'i shes pa rnam par bcad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar 'khrul pa'i shes pa rnam par bcad ce na /
translated: Then, how is the definition of perception distinguished from erroneous consciousness?

original: mngon sum du byed pa thams cad ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa thams cad ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all that is made manifest is perception.

original: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa la sogs pa yang gnyis nyid du snang ba la mngon sum kho na'o //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa la sogs pa yang gnyis nyid du snang ba la mngon sum kho na'o //
translated: Even the consciousness of two moons, etc., is only perception in the appearance of duality.

original: des na gang zhig gang la mngon sum du byed pa de ni de la mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: des na gang zhig gang la mngon sum du byed pa de ni de la mngon sum yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which makes something manifest is perception of that.

original: de ni phyi rol la 'khrul pa yin na de la ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni phyi rol la 'khrul pa yin na de la ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: If it is an error with respect to external things, then it is not a direct perception.

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa gzhan yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni rtog pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa gzhan yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni rtog pa tsam yin no //
translated: To say that there is something else that is different from the nature of appearance is mere imagination.

original: de skad du yang 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni yid kyis 'khrul pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du yang 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni yid kyis 'khrul pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus it is said that ‚Äúerror is the object of the imagination of the intellect.‚Äù

original: phyi rol la ma 'khrul pa yang rtog pa'i shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol la ma 'khrul pa yang rtog pa'i shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is not an error with respect to external things, then it is a conceptual cognition.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: This is true.üîΩAs will be explained:

original: 'di ltar / ci lta ci ltar don bsams pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / ci lta ci ltar don bsams pa //
translated: The more one reflects on the meaning,

original: de lta de ltar rnam par bral //
analyzed: de lta de ltar rnam par bral //
translated: The more one is separated from it.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa //
translated: What the wise have said

original: de ni dngos stobs 'ongs pa yin //üîΩzhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos stobs 'ongs pa yin // zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Is based on the power of fact.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang / khyad par dang ni khyad par gzhi //
analyzed: gzhan yang / khyad par dang ni khyad par gzhi //
translated: Distinction and the basis of distinction,

original: 'brel dang 'jig rten gzhung lugs ni //
analyzed: 'brel dang 'jig rten gzhung lugs ni //
translated: Connection and worldly convention,

original: bzung nas de dag bsdams byas te /
analyzed: bzung nas de dag bsdams byas te /
translated: Having grasped them, one is bound by them.

original: de ltar rtogs kyi gzhan du min //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs kyi gzhan du min //
translated: One understands in this way, not otherwise.

original: dper dbyug can bzhin rigs sogs kyi //
analyzed: dper dbyug can bzhin rigs sogs kyi //
translated: For example, like the cognition of one who has a stick,

original: bye brag rtogs pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bye brag rtogs pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: because there is no cognition of the particulars, such as the class.

original: de ldan sbyor ba yod min pa //
analyzed: de ldan sbyor ba yod min pa //
translated: There is no application that possesses that,

original: des na 'di la rtogs pa med //
analyzed: des na 'di la rtogs pa med //
translated: therefore there is no cognition of that.

original: rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Cognition is the apprehension of application.

original: sbyor bar byed pa yang khyad par la sogs pa so sor 'dzin pa med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa yang khyad par la sogs pa so sor 'dzin pa med pa ma yin te /
translated: And the one who applies does not apprehend each particular, such as the class,

original: dper na dbyig pa can du rtogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dbyig pa can du rtogs pa bzhin no //
translated: for example, like the cognition of one who has a stick.

original: rigs la sogs pa ni so sor nges par bzung ba med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa dang sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ji ltar dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa ni so sor nges par bzung ba med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa dang sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ji ltar dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin /
translated: Because there is no apprehension of the particulars, such as the class, there is no application that possesses that, therefore how can the sense consciousness be conceptual?üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / tha dad med par snang ba ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / tha dad med par snang ba ni //
translated: That which appears without distinction,

original: gang zhig gang dang sbyor bar byed //
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang sbyor bar byed //
translated: what is it that is applied to what?üîΩThat which appears as distinct,

original: tha dad par ni snang ba dag / sbyor ba dang ni rtogs pa med //
analyzed: tha dad par ni snang ba dag / sbyor ba dang ni rtogs pa med //
translated: there is no application or cognition.

original: tha mi dad par snang ba de ni gcig kho na yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par snang ba de ni gcig kho na yin te /
translated: That which appears without distinction is only one.

original: de la sbyor ba'i don spyi zhig yin te /
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i don spyi zhig yin te /
translated: There is an object generality that is applied to that.

original: sbyor ba ni gnyis la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gnyis la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the relation is dependent on the two.

original: ci ste tha dad par snang na ni /
analyzed: ci ste tha dad par snang na ni /
translated: But if they appear as different,

original: de'i tshe gnyis phan tshun dben par snang ba'i phyir sbyor ba shin tu yang med pas na sbyor ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyis phan tshun dben par snang ba'i phyir sbyor ba shin tu yang med pas na sbyor ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
translated: then at that time, because they appear as mutually exclusive, the relation is not possible at all.

original: de'i phyir don dam par na sbyor ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir don dam par na sbyor ba med do //
translated: Therefore, ultimately, there is no relation.

original: gal te khyad par la sogs pa so sor snang ba dag la 'gyur du chug kyang rigs dang ldan pa la sogs pa la ni 'di srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te khyad par la sogs pa so sor snang ba dag la 'gyur du chug kyang rigs dang ldan pa la sogs pa la ni 'di srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were possible in the case of individual appearances of difference, etc., it is not possible in the case of a class, etc.

original: rigs pa @234b dang yon tan dang bya ba dag ni de dang ldan pa las tha dad par snang ba med do //
analyzed: rigs pa @234b dang yon tan dang bya ba dag ni de dang ldan pa las tha dad par snang ba med do //
translated: For a class, a quality, and an action do not appear as different from that which possesses them.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dres par snang ba ni sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dres par snang ba ni sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the relation is the appearance of a mixture.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: tha dad pa dag ni 'dres par snang ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dag ni 'dres par snang ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of a mixture is not tenable in the case of different things.

original: de ltar snang ba yul dang dus mtshungs pa'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar snang ba yul dang dus mtshungs pa'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is so because the appearance is simultaneous with the object and time,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: yul dang dus mtshungs pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus mtshungs pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object and the cognition are different in nature, even when they are simultaneous.

original: yul dang dus tha dad pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na'i phyir de ltar snang ba yin gyi yul dang dus tha dad pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dus tha dad pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na'i phyir de ltar snang ba yin gyi yul dang dus tha dad pas ni ma yin no //
translated: And when they are different in terms of place and time, they are different in nature, and that is why they appear as they do, not because they are different in terms of place and time.

original: gal te de la rang bzhin tha dad pa med na ni yul la sogs pa tha dad par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de la rang bzhin tha dad pa med na ni yul la sogs pa tha dad par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they were not different in nature, they would not appear as different in terms of place and so on.

original: yul tha mi dad kyang gzhan dag ni kha dog dang dbyibs dag dang / rlung dang nyi ma dag tha dad par snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: yul tha mi dad kyang gzhan dag ni kha dog dang dbyibs dag dang / rlung dang nyi ma dag tha dad par snang ba nyid do //
translated: Even though the place is not different, others do appear as different in terms of color and shape, and in terms of wind and sun.

original: yul la sogs pa tha mi dad pas ni snang ba tha dad par nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa tha mi dad pas ni snang ba tha dad par nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The difference in appearance is not due to the difference in place and so on.

original: ci ste 'phrod pa 'du ba'i 'brel pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu 'dres pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'phrod pa 'du ba'i 'brel pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu 'dres pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the appearance of a single integrated entity is due to the power of the relation of contact,

original: de ltar yin na ni thams cad du de ltar rtogs par thal bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ltar yin na ni thams cad du de ltar rtogs par thal bar 'gyur bas /
translated: then it follows that it would be cognized as such in all cases.

original: tha dad pa med par snang ba thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med par snang ba thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the appearance of non-difference does not prove non-difference.

original: gal te ba lang zhes khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid las blo 'di sbyor ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ba lang zhes khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid las blo 'di sbyor ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is not this cognition of the stick-man applied to the cognition of the qualified cow-man?

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni gang du yang khyad par med par dmigs pa ma yin te dbyug pa can zhes rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni gang du yang khyad par med par dmigs pa ma yin te dbyug pa can zhes rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of the qualified is never perceived without the qualifier, for it is understood as ‚Äúthe stick-man.‚Äù

original: de ni 'di yin no zhes bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di yin no zhes bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it cannot be demonstrated that ‚Äúthis is it,‚Äù because there is no individual appearance.

original: dbyig pa can no zhes bya bar shes pa la yang dbyug pa tha dad par snang ba ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: dbyig pa can no zhes bya bar shes pa la yang dbyug pa tha dad par snang ba ni yod pa yin te /
translated: But in the cognition of the stick-man, the stick appears as different.

original: der ni skyes bu tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der ni skyes bu tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For there the man alone appears.

original: dbyug pa dang 'brel pa'i snga rol nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dbyug pa dang 'brel pa'i snga rol nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why does it not appear prior to the connection with the stick?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: tshogs pa med pas khyad par can nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa med pas khyad par can nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the qualified is not different in the absence of the collection.

original: skyes bu la khyad par can nyid gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu la khyad par can nyid gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But the man is not different from the man with the stick,

original: de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is not perceived in the absence of the stick.

original: khyad par can ni dbyug pa can nyid yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can ni dbyug pa can nyid yin te /
translated: The man with the stick is the man,

original: dper na chu la sogs pa'i nus pa ni sa bon gyi lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu la sogs pa'i nus pa ni sa bon gyi lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the seed is the cause of the sprout, etc.üîΩIf the stick is perceived, then it follows that the man with the stick is perceived,

original: gal te dbyig pa yang snang ba yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag go zhes rtogs par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dbyig pa yang snang ba yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag go zhes rtogs par thal lo zhe na /
translated: and the expression ‚Äúthe man with the stick‚Äù is a redundant one.

original: de thams cad ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de thams cad ni mi 'thad de /
translated: All this is not tenable.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig snang na ni //
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig snang na ni //
translated: If the man is perceived without the stick,

original: mi rtogs khyad par nyid mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtogs khyad par nyid mi 'gyur //
translated: then he is not perceived as the man with the stick.

original: de ste snang ba yin na ni //
analyzed: de ste snang ba yin na ni //
translated: If the stick is perceived,

original: dbyug dang skyes bu dag ces 'gyur //
analyzed: dbyug dang skyes bu dag ces 'gyur //
translated: then it is the man with the stick that is perceived.

original: dper na skyes bu'i zhes bya bar snang ba 'ba' zhig la khyad par can nyid yod pa ma yin pa de @235a * //
analyzed: dper na skyes bu'i zhes bya bar snang ba 'ba' zhig la khyad par can nyid yod pa ma yin pa de @235a * //
translated: Just as the man is perceived without the stick,

original: bzhin du dbyig pa can zhes bya ba la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzhin du dbyig pa can zhes bya ba la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: so the man with the stick is perceived.

original: gal te khyad par can nyid do zhe na /üîΩ'di la yang brjod pa /
analyzed: gal te khyad par can nyid do zhe na /üîΩ'di la yang brjod pa /
translated: If the man with the stick is perceived,üîΩthen the man is perceived as the man with the stick.

original: rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis //üîΩkhyad par can gyi shes yin nam //
analyzed: rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis // khyad par can gyi shes yin nam //
translated: Is it a cognition that is qualified by something that is based on itself?

original: gzhal bya'i khyad par las kyang rung //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i khyad par las kyang rung //
translated: Or is it a cognition that is qualified by the object that is cognized?

original: gnyi ga'ang bden pa nyid ma yin //
analyzed: gnyi ga'ang bden pa nyid ma yin //
translated: Neither is true.

original: gal te re zhig rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyi rtogs pa yin na ni de'i tshe don sbyor ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te re zhig rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyi rtogs pa yin na ni de'i tshe don sbyor ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is a cognition that is qualified by something that is based on itself, then it is not a cognition that is the nature of the engagement of the object.

original: bde ba la sogs pa rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis ni dbang po'i rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis ni dbang po'i rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of pleasure, etc., is not qualified by something that is based on itself, because the cognition of the sense faculty is not accompanied by conceptualization.

original: yul med par shes pa 'i khyad par gyi de nyid mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yul med par shes pa 'i khyad par gyi de nyid mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is a cognition that is qualified by the object that is cognized, then it is not a cognition that is the nature of the engagement of the object, because the object does not exist.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen las kyang khyad par bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen las kyang khyad par bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained that the distinction is established from the immediately preceding condition.

original: khyad par yul la brten pa yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyi ga rtogs pa'i phyir dbyig pa can gyi shes pa bskyed pa tsam gyis yul can du ji ltar 'gyur gnyi ga rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du brjod par zad
analyzed: khyad par yul la brten pa yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyi ga rtogs pa'i phyir dbyig pa can gyi shes pa bskyed pa tsam gyis yul can du ji ltar 'gyur gnyi ga rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du brjod par zad
translated: If it is based on an object, then because both the stick and the person are realized, how could it be the subjective aspect merely by generating the consciousness of the stick-holder?üîΩThe statement ‚Äúboth are realized‚Äù is mere convention,

original: kyi don dam par ni ma yin te rnam par rtog pa ni yul med pa can yin na ji ltar gnyis kyi tshig tu mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: kyi don dam par ni ma yin te rnam par rtog pa ni yul med pa can yin na ji ltar gnyis kyi tshig tu mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: but not ultimately, because if conception is without an object, how could it not be the word ‚Äúboth‚Äù?

original: 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad de /
analyzed: 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad de /
translated: This is mere convention,

original: bag chags kyi khyad par snga ma snga ma las 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: bag chags kyi khyad par snga ma snga ma las 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: because it arises from the special latent potentialities.

original: gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par ni rtogs kyang de brjod par mi 'dod pas skyes bu tsam zhig brtsis nas gcig tu 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par ni rtogs kyang de brjod par mi 'dod pas skyes bu tsam zhig brtsis nas gcig tu 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the special is not primary, it is realized but not asserted to be expressed. Therefore, it is counted as just a person and is one.

original: gal te tshul 'dis skyes bu tsam yul yin par brjod na brjod la rag mod /
analyzed: gal te tshul 'dis skyes bu tsam yul yin par brjod na brjod la rag mod /
translated: If this method is mere expression, then it is mere expression.

original: snang ba med par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba med par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not that it does not appear.

original: ci ste yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par can rnams 'ba' zhig snang ba yin yang de la khyad par can nyid shes pa la snang ba med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par can rnams 'ba' zhig snang ba yin yang de la khyad par can nyid shes pa la snang ba med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is argued that although the objects are qualified by the distinctions of place, time, etc., the qualification itself does not appear in consciousness,

original: 'di la yang lan du /üîΩdo gzhan dang ni 'brel pa'am//
analyzed: 'di la yang lan du / do gzhan dang ni 'brel pa'am//
translated: then the reply to that is this:üîΩIf it is related to something else,

original: rang bzhin mi mthun pa nyid ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi mthun pa nyid ni //
translated: or if it is a difference in intrinsic nature,

original: khyad par can nyid de yi tshe //
analyzed: khyad par can nyid de yi tshe //
translated: then at that time,

original: gzhan phyogs thams cad nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan phyogs thams cad nyams par 'gyur //
translated: all other positions are undermined.

original: gal te re zhig don gzhan dang bcas pa nyid khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: gal te re zhig don gzhan dang bcas pa nyid khyad par can yin te /
translated: If it is argued that the qualification is the possession of another object,

original: dper na rgyan gyi khyad par can bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na rgyan gyi khyad par can bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like the qualification of an ornament,

original: snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa de ni shes pa la snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa de ni shes pa la snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then the prior and subsequent, etc., do not exist in the appearance in consciousness.

original: de la phyogs gzhan snang ba ni med do //
analyzed: de la phyogs gzhan snang ba ni med do //
translated: There is no appearance of another position there.

original: ci ste mi 'dra ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i bum pa dag mi 'dra ba nyid du snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste mi 'dra ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i bum pa dag mi 'dra ba nyid du snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But if it is a difference, then the prior and subsequent pots do not appear as different.

original: mi 'dra ba ni don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba ni don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
translated: The difference is the nature of the object itself.

original: de snang na ni rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de snang na ni rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it appears, then there is no conceptualization.

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa'i yul nyid kyang spangs zin to //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa'i yul nyid kyang spangs zin to //
translated: The object of a determinate cognition has already been refuted.

original: de'i phyir gal te gnyis su snang @235b ba yin na ni sbyor ba yin zhing de las ni rtog par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te gnyis su snang @235b ba yin na ni sbyor ba yin zhing de las ni rtog par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs yin no //
translated: Therefore, if there is an appearance of duality, there is a combination, and from that there is conceptualization. This is the correct principle.

original: de la gnyis su snang ba tsam ni rtog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngar so sor mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnyis su snang ba tsam ni rtog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngar so sor mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
translated: In this regard, the mere appearance of duality is not conceptualization. Rather, it is the combination that is preceded by the prior perception of each.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa dmigs pa'i phyir rigs la sogs pa snang ba nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa dmigs pa'i phyir rigs la sogs pa snang ba nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If you say that the appearance of a universal, etc. is not an appearance because a cognition that is in conformity with it is not perceived,

original: de la bshad pa /
analyzed: de la bshad pa /
translated: then in response to that we say:

original: rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang //
analyzed: rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang //
translated: What is the cognition that is in conformity with it?

original: de yang sgra dang gsal bar snang //
analyzed: de yang sgra dang gsal bar snang //
translated: It appears as a word and a manifestation.üîΩIt is said to be a universal,

original: kha dog dbyibs yig rnam pa yis //üîΩstong pa ba lang nyid du brjod //
analyzed: kha dog dbyibs yig rnam pa yis //üîΩstong pa ba lang nyid du brjod //
translated: because it is empty of color, shape, and letters.

original: de nyid mtshungs pa nyid yin yang //
analyzed: de nyid mtshungs pa nyid yin yang //
translated: And it is the same with the universal.

original: mig gi yul la mthong med de //
analyzed: mig gi yul la mthong med de //
translated: But the object of the eye is not seen,

original: snang ba gnyis ni med phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba gnyis ni med phyir ro //
translated: because the two appearances are absent.

original: blo tha dad pa'ang rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: blo tha dad pa'ang rnyed par dka' //
translated: And it is difficult to find a different cognition.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de la ni spyi gzhan snang ba med do //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de la ni spyi gzhan snang ba med do //
translated: In the cognition that is related, there is no appearance of another universal.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin snang ngo zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the appearance of the nature of the related object is seen,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: sgra dang gsal ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang gsal ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because apart from the sound and the manifestation, nothing else is seen.

original: sgra las spyi'i rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra las spyi'i rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the cognition of the universal appears from the sound,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: mthong ba'i mdog dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du dran pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i mdog dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du dran pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the color and shape are remembered as they were seen.

original: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba gzhan snang ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba gzhan snang ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the appearance of another related object does not exist,

original: kha dog dang dbyibs tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because only color and shape appear.

original: rje sus 'gro ba can thams cad ni ming tsam dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: rje sus 'gro ba can thams cad ni ming tsam dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: All related objects are connected only by name.

original: 'di yang ba lang 'di yang ba lang zhes ming dang / don byed pa mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang ba lang 'di yang ba lang zhes ming dang / don byed pa mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The name ‚Äúcow‚Äù and the name ‚Äúox‚Äù are the same in that they are names, and they are the same in that they perform the same function.

original: yang na rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa nyid kyi mtshungs pa yin gyi /
