translated: As long as one does not see the thing,

original: de la brda 'jug yod ma yin //
analyzed: de la brda 'jug yod ma yin //
translated: the sign cannot be applied to it.

original: brda zhugs pa ni med na yang //
analyzed: brda zhugs pa ni med na yang //
translated: And if the sign has not been applied,

original: mthong bas srid par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong bas srid par ga la 'gyur //
translated: how can one see it?

original: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: Nature and so on are not naturally existent.

original: 'di ltar kha cig ni yod pa las zhes bya ba 'di khams su byas te /
analyzed: 'di ltar kha cig ni yod pa las zhes bya ba 'di khams su byas te /
translated: In this regard, some take the position that the sign is applied to the existent.

original: de'i 'og tu aa ta glo bur du 'ongs par byed la gzhan dag ni yod pa la aa sa khams su byas nas dang po'i aa phyis te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu aa ta glo bur du 'ongs par byed la gzhan dag ni yod pa la aa sa khams su byas nas dang po'i aa phyis te /
translated: Then, the a·π≠a is suddenly brought forth.üîΩüîΩThe other a is made into the a·π≠a element and the first a is eliminated.

original: santi zhes bya bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: santi zhes bya bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Then, the a of santa is suddenly brought down, and the other a is made into the a of the aham element, and the first a is elided, making it santa.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yul la tha snyad tsam gyi dgos pas brdar btags pa yin gyi rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yul la tha snyad tsam gyi dgos pas brdar btags pa yin gyi rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this way, the conventional purpose is to designate the object, but it is not due to another reason.

original: 'dod pa dang rjes su 'brel pa can gyi brda ni rgyu mtshan can yod pa kho na la 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang rjes su 'brel pa can gyi brda ni rgyu mtshan can yod pa kho na la 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: The designation that is related to desire is not only due to a reason,

original: 'khrul pa mthong bas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa mthong bas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because error is seen to be due to error.

original: de'i phyir dngos po dang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i sgra ni dngos por gyur pa tha dad pa'i don gyi rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po dang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i sgra ni dngos por gyur pa tha dad pa'i don gyi rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the words ‚Äúthing‚Äù and ‚Äúhouse‚Äù are not due to a reason that is a different object that is a thing.

original: des na tha snyad mtshungs pa mthong ba las spyi brtag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tha snyad mtshungs pa mthong ba las spyi brtag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the universal is not to be imagined from seeing the same convention.

original: 'o na ji ltar blo dang sgra dag rjes su 'gro ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar blo dang sgra dag rjes su 'gro ba yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how are the mind and the word related?

original: smras pa / dngos po la sogs rjes su 'gro ba yod pa las shes pa rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: smras pa / dngos po la sogs rjes su 'gro ba yod pa las shes pa rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Objection: Consciousness does not follow the existence of things and so on,

original: 'on kyang bag chags kyi sa bon rab tu sad pa rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bag chags kyi sa bon rab tu sad pa rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
translated: but it follows the activation of the seeds of latent propensities.

original: dper na mi sdug pa'i dngos po @241a * //
analyzed: dper na mi sdug pa'i dngos po @241a * //
translated: For example, even with regard to an unattractive thing,

original: la yang goms pa las sdug pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba bzhin no //
analyzed: la yang goms pa las sdug pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba bzhin no //
translated: from habituation, attraction follows.

original: 'di ltar / tha snyad kyang gang dngos chos kyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / tha snyad kyang gang dngos chos kyi //
translated: Thus, even conventionally,

original: de 'dra'i rnam shes rgyu yi ni //üîΩdon de dag la shes pa des //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rnam shes rgyu yi ni // don de dag la shes pa des //
translated: the cause of such a consciousnessüîΩis not a thing that exists.

original: de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: That consciousness realizes its object in that way.üîΩIn terms of conceptual thought, consciousness

original: tha dad tha dad min bar ni //üîΩrtog la shes pa'ang de bzhin no //üîΩde phyir de 'bras med bral ba //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad min bar ni // rtog la shes pa'ang de bzhin no // de phyir de 'bras med bral ba //
translated: is neither different nor not different.üîΩTherefore, it is not that it follows a single thing

original: rjes 'gro dngos gcig yod ma yin //
analyzed: rjes 'gro dngos gcig yod ma yin //
translated: that is not devoid of result.

original: gang gis bag chags sad pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: gang gis bag chags sad pa'i rim pas /
translated: By the process of activating latent propensities,

original: thams cad la rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po rnams nyid kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad la rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po rnams nyid kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: The entities that generate a cognition that realizes all things as having one nature generate a cognition that realizes them in that way.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like the feeling of pleasure, etc.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la ni /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la ni /
translated: In the case of the consciousness of pleasure, etc.,

original: don la brten pa'i rgyu mtshan bde ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don la brten pa'i rgyu mtshan bde ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: the reason for the existence of pleasure, etc., which is based on an object, does not exist.

original: de lta bu'i nyid yin na sdug bsngal mi skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i nyid yin na sdug bsngal mi skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it did exist in that way, it would follow, absurdly, that pain would not arise.

original: de lta bu nyid ma yin pa'i yang yod do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid ma yin pa'i yang yod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it does not exist in that way,

original: de lta na rang bzhin gnyi ga rtogs par thal te /
analyzed: de lta na rang bzhin gnyi ga rtogs par thal te /
translated: then it follows, absurdly, that both natures would be realized,

original: kha dog dang dbyibs rtogs pa bzhin no //üîΩci ste ma mthong bas gegs byas pas de lta ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs rtogs pa bzhin no // ci ste ma mthong bas gegs byas pas de lta ma yin no zhe na /
translated: just as the color and shape are realized.üîΩIf you say that this is not so because it is obstructed by the fact that it is not seen,

original: de ltar gyur na ni ma mthong ba kho nas de lta bur gyur pa' rtogs pa nyid skyed par ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni ma mthong ba kho nas de lta bur gyur pa' rtogs pa nyid skyed par ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: then why do you not accept that it is the fact that it is not seen that generates the realization that it exists in that way?

original: ma mthong ba ni nges par byed pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba ni nges par byed pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But the non-perception is a determiner, not a prover.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition.

original: sgrub pa dang nges par byed pa dag srid na /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang nges par byed pa dag srid na /
translated: If there were both a prover and a determiner,

original: sgrub pa nyid mchog yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa nyid mchog yin te /
translated: proving would be the best,

original: nges par byed pa ni rtog pa du ma'i rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par byed pa ni rtog pa du ma'i rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the determiner would be the basis of many conceptual thoughts.

original: 'di ltar / bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid don yin par brtag gam /
analyzed: 'di ltar / bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid don yin par brtag gam /
translated: Thus, is the possession of pleasure, etc. itself the meaning of the word, or is it something else?

original: 'on te gzhan du yin mthong ba ba yin par rtogs pa la ni mthong ba'i rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan du yin mthong ba ba yin par rtogs pa la ni mthong ba'i rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad /
translated: If it is understood that it is something else, then the understanding is only of the word.

original: de'i phyir tha dad par gyur pa nyid 'ga' zhig la tha dad par 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad par gyur pa nyid 'ga' zhig la tha dad par 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the difference itself that is apprehended as different in some cases.

original: de rjes su 'gro ba nyid las spyi'i don grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rjes su 'gro ba nyid las spyi'i don grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the meaning of the word is established from the mere concomitance,

original: bar gyi sha lhag pa'i spyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: bar gyi sha lhag pa'i spyis ci zhig bya /
translated: what is the use of the middle piece of meat?

original: nang gi rgyu shes pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan yin par ni gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos te /
analyzed: nang gi rgyu shes pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan yin par ni gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos te /
translated: It is certainly to be accepted that the internal causes are the reasons for the cognitions.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: spyi dang de'i rgyu rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang de'i rgyu rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it would follow, absurdly, that the general and its cause would be cognized in two different ways.

original: 'phrod pa 'du bas gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du bas gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say, They are mixed into one through contact,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: we reply, no.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba yang rnam pa gsum par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba yang rnam pa gsum par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It would follow, absurdly, that contact would be cognized in three different ways.

original: de'i phyir na der rtogs par 'gyur ba'i nus pa med pa nyid nang gi rgyu la rag las par khas blang bar bya ba yin no //üîΩde bzhin du shes pa yang de la gcig tu rtogs pa'i skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir na der rtogs par 'gyur ba'i nus pa med pa nyid nang gi rgyu la rag las par khas blang bar bya ba yin no // de bzhin du shes pa yang de la gcig tu rtogs pa'i skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, you must accept that the absence of the capacity to be cognized as such is dependent upon an internal cause.

original: @241b rjes su 'gro ba dang / rigs zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: @241b rjes su 'gro ba dang / rigs zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Likewise, consciousness is the cause of the generation of the cognition of it as one, and therefore it is called homogeneous and of the same type.

original: rigs gzhan las khas blang bar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs gzhan las khas blang bar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not right to accept that it is of a different type.

original: lhag ma ni skabs nyid du bshad zin to //
analyzed: lhag ma ni skabs nyid du bshad zin to //
translated: The rest has been explained in the context itself.

original: de'i phyir tha mi dad par zhen pa 'bras bu can nyid kyis spyi'i tha snyad yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha mi dad par zhen pa 'bras bu can nyid kyis spyi'i tha snyad yin no //
translated: Therefore, the convention of generality is due to the fact that the cognition of nondifference has an effect.

original: de'i 'bras bu can de nyid spyi'i yin no zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can de nyid spyi'i yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the result of that is a universal,

original: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i de'i 'bras bu can med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i de'i 'bras bu can med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: no, because there is no result of that which is different from its own nature.

original: ci ste yang /üîΩde lta na ni chu dang sa la sogs pa rnams la yang 'bras bu myu gu yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste yang / de lta na ni chu dang sa la sogs pa rnams la yang 'bras bu myu gu yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: But if that is so,

original: de'i 'bras bu can du rtogs pa nyid ni spyi'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can du rtogs pa nyid ni spyi'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: then a sprout, which is the result of water, earth, etc., would be understood as one, because the understanding of it as the result of that is the understanding of a universal.

original: ba lang nyid du rtogs pa kho na de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang nyid du rtogs pa kho na de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: No, because the understanding of a cow would be just like that.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa ma 'phrigs pa las spyir rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa ma 'phrigs pa las spyir rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the understanding of a universal is from not understanding difference,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
translated: but not from anything else. This is the position.

original: ci ste der spyi nyid rtogs so zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: ci ste der spyi nyid rtogs so zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: But why not accept that a universal itself is understood there?

original: 'di la spyi yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnod par byed pa'i shes pa skyes pa ni med do //
analyzed: 'di la spyi yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnod par byed pa'i shes pa skyes pa ni med do //
translated: There is no cognition that invalidates the statement that a universal does not exist there.

original: rtsod pa'i dub pa la ni dgos pa med do //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dub pa la ni dgos pa med do //
translated: There is no need to tire oneself with debate.

original: ji ltar du mar rtogs pas dub pa de bzhin du rtsod pas dub pa yang yin pas mtshungs par thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar du mar rtogs pas dub pa de bzhin du rtsod pas dub pa yang yin pas mtshungs par thal lo zhe na /
translated: Just as it is tiring to understand many things, so it is tiring to argue about them.

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: This is not correct.

original: 'di ltar / rtsod pa tsam zhig 'dren pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rtsod pa tsam zhig 'dren pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is only argument that is being brought up,

original: gal te spyi ni rtog byed na //
analyzed: gal te spyi ni rtog byed na //
translated: If a universal is what is understood,

original: ma brtags gcig pus spyod yul ni //
analyzed: ma brtags gcig pus spyod yul ni //
translated: then the object of the mere unanalyzed

original: kun rdzob yod pa yin par 'gyur //
analyzed: kun rdzob yod pa yin par 'gyur //
translated: would exist conventionally.

original: spyi ni rnam par dpyad na yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni rnam par dpyad na yod pa ma yin no //
translated: A universal does not exist when analyzed.

original: rnam par dpyad pa med par khas len na ni gcig tu ma brtags na nyams dga' ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad pa med par khas len na ni gcig tu ma brtags na nyams dga' ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one accepts it without analysis, then it is just what is pleasing when not investigated.

original: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid de ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid de ni //
translated: That is the result of the same effect

original: dngos rnams la yod de yi phyir //
analyzed: dngos rnams la yod de yi phyir //
translated: because it exists in things.üîΩTherefore, the listener of things

original: dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' nyan //
analyzed: dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' nyan //
translated: is the listener of that.

original: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams las log pa 'bras bu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can de nyid ni khro bo la sogs pa rnams la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams las log pa 'bras bu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can de nyid ni khro bo la sogs pa rnams la yod pa yin te /
translated: That which is characterized by having the same effect as that which is not its effect is found in things such as anger.

original: de'i phyir dngos po la 'jug pa'i mnyan pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan de dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po la 'jug pa'i mnyan pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan de dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that engages an entity is said to be endowed with an aspect that is the cause of engagement.

original: 'o na ji ltar spyi'i blo rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar spyi'i blo rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: But how can a cognition of a universal be endowed with an aspect,

original: ma 'dres pa la ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa la ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because a universal is not differentiated?

original: 'dir lan du /
analyzed: 'dir lan du /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: de las gzhan dang ma 'dres pa ni nges par rnams pa dang ldan pa'i blo dang 'brel pa yin la ;
analyzed: de las gzhan dang ma 'dres pa ni nges par rnams pa dang ldan pa'i blo dang 'brel pa yin la ;
translated: That which is not mixed with anything else is related to a cognition that is definitely endowed with an aspect.

original: de yang bag chags dang 'brel ba las rnam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bag chags dang 'brel ba las rnam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: And that is endowed with an aspect due to the connection with latent impressions.

original: 'di ltar blo de ni de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa snga ma snga ma las 'ongs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar blo de ni de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa snga ma snga ma las 'ongs pa yin no //
translated: Thus that cognition comes from a previous cognition that is like it.

original: 'di ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa la khra bo la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i gzhal bya gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //üîΩgzhal bya'i rnam par snang ba'i shes pas gzhal @242a * //
analyzed: 'di ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa la khra bo la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i gzhal bya gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no // gzhal bya'i rnam par snang ba'i shes pas gzhal @242a * //
translated: In the cognition that thinks ‚ÄúThis is a cow,‚Äù there is no other object of comprehension that is differentiated from a cow that is multicolored and so on.

original: bya'i rnam pa 'jog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bya'i rnam pa 'jog pa yin gyi /
translated: A cognition that appears in the aspect of the object of comprehension determines the aspect of the object of comprehension.

original: gzhal bya'i rnam pas stong pa'i shes pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya'i rnam pas stong pa'i shes pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by a mere consciousness that is empty of the aspect of the object.

original: gal te shes pa de thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa de thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba yin na /
translated: If that consciousness arises from the power of beginningless predispositions,

original: 'o na ni de dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid la mi slu bar 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po la mi slu bar go ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na ni de dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid la mi slu bar 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po la mi slu bar go ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: then it is related to that, and therefore it is not mistaken in regard to that, so how could it be understood to be nonmistaken in regard to things?

original: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu med pa las ldog pa yongs su bcad par 'gyur dgos so //üîΩde'i 'bras bu can nyid de las de'i phyi rol gyi nus pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu med pa las ldog pa yongs su bcad par 'gyur dgos so // de'i 'bras bu can nyid de las de'i phyi rol gyi nus pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to eliminate the absence of its effect.üîΩThe possession of its effect is either its external potency or the elimination of its external nature.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.

original: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi ldog pa nyid do //üîΩde'i rjes su 'gro ba na de nyid rigs yin pas rigs spangs pa ma yin la /üîΩde yongs su bcad pa la yang phyi rol nyid yongs su bcad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi ldog pa nyid do // de'i rjes su 'gro ba na de nyid rigs yin pas rigs spangs pa ma yin la / de yongs su bcad pa la yang phyi rol nyid yongs su bcad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: When it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: When it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.

original: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former.üîΩWhen it is ascertained that it is not the latter, it is not the former

original: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la //
analyzed: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la //
translated: The external object is the exclusion of other,

original: reg pa med kyang sgra de ni //
analyzed: reg pa med kyang sgra de ni //
translated: and although the word does not touch it,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni //
translated: the reflection of the concept

original: de yi mthar thug rnams dang 'brel //
analyzed: de yi mthar thug rnams dang 'brel //
translated: is connected with the external object.

original: des na gzhan sel mthar thug phyir //
analyzed: des na gzhan sel mthar thug phyir //
translated: Therefore, because of the finality of the exclusion of other,

original: mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod //
analyzed: mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod //
translated: the word is said to perform the exclusion of other.

original: gal te yang sgra las skye ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin la reg pa med pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te yang sgra las skye ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin la reg pa med pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even though the concept that arises from the word does not touch the external object,

original: rnam par rtog pa de'i gzugs brnyan ni phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa'i nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de'i gzugs brnyan ni phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa'i nyid de /
translated: the reflection of that concept is the external object,

original: phyi rol gyi sgo nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi sgo nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises from the external object.

original: brgyud pas skye ba'i phyir don la ma reg kyang phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brgyud pas skye ba'i phyir don la ma reg kyang phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although it does not touch the object, because it arises through a series, it is not the external object.

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i don gyis bskyed pa gzugs brnyan de yang gzhan las ldog pa nyid du snang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i don gyis bskyed pa gzugs brnyan de yang gzhan las ldog pa nyid du snang ngo //
translated: The reflection that is produced by the object that is the exclusion of other appears as the exclusion of other.

original: sgra las kyang de nyid tha mi tha dad pa'i ldog pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sgra las kyang de nyid tha mi tha dad pa'i ldog pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: And from the word, the exclusion that is not different from that is understood.

original: phyi rol dang tha mi dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol dang tha mi dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not non-different from the external object.

original: des na gzhan las ldog pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i phyir mnyan pa gzhan sel ba byed par brjod do //
analyzed: des na gzhan las ldog pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i phyir mnyan pa gzhan sel ba byed par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, because it produces a conceptual cognition that has the form of the exclusion of other, it is said to perform the function of excluding other.

original: gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug par byed pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug par byed pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: Also, because it engages in the exclusion of other.

original: phyi rol la reg pa med kyang rnam par rtog pa de las tha snyad byed pa rnams gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi rol la reg pa med kyang rnam par rtog pa de las tha snyad byed pa rnams gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it does not touch the external object, those who use the conceptual cognition engage in the exclusion of other.

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i yul can du brjod do //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i yul can du brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is said to have an object that is the exclusion of other.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bzung ba blo las tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bzung ba blo las tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the object of conceptual cognition perceived as different from cognition?

original: de ji ltar na blo'i rang bzhin nyid yin /üîΩde nyid las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ji ltar na blo'i rang bzhin nyid yin / de nyid las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: How can it be the nature of cognition itself?üîΩWhat appears as different from it does not become it.

original: las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: What appears as different from it does not become it.

original: tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: What appears as different has the characteristic of being different.

original: de las gzhan tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de las gzhan tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because there is no other reason for their difference.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: tha @242b dad par snang ba tsam ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha @242b dad par snang ba tsam ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere appearance of difference is not the definition of difference.

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi gang 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no //üîΩldog pa bzhin du sgra dag las //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi gang 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no // ldog pa bzhin du sgra dag las //
translated: The appearance of difference without error is the definition of difference, not just any appearance of difference.üîΩThe form of an object appears in consciousness

original: shes la don gyi gzugs brnyan snang //
analyzed: shes la don gyi gzugs brnyan snang //
translated: as if it were a reflection,

original: gang de'ang don gyi bdag nyid min //
analyzed: gang de'ang don gyi bdag nyid min //
translated: but that is not the nature of the object.

original: de 'khrul bag chags las byung yin ;
analyzed: de 'khrul bag chags las byung yin ;
translated: It arises from the latent impressions of error.

original: / gal te yang de kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba de lta na yang de dngos po ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: / gal te yang de kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba de lta na yang de dngos po ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Even if the appearance of color and shape is like that, it is not a real thing.

original: 'on kyang de'i gzugs brnyan yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i gzugs brnyan yin no //
translated: But it is a reflection of it.

original: 'gal ba ci yod ce na gang gi phyir de ni bag chags kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba ci yod ce na gang gi phyir de ni bag chags kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is the contradiction? Because it arises from a cause that has the characteristic of latent impressions.

original: de lta yin mod /
analyzed: de lta yin mod /
translated: Even if that is so,

original: ji ltar dngos por mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos por mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how is it not a real thing?

original: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir /
translated: because it depends on its own cause.

original: rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the floating hairs seen by a person with an eye disease.

original: ci ste bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa yin yang dngos po nyid do snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa yin yang dngos po nyid do snyam na /
translated: If you think that even though it arises from the power of latent impressions, it is a real entity,

original: dngos po ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //üîΩ'o na blo'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po de nyid sgras brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o // 'o na blo'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po de nyid sgras brjod pa yin te /
translated: we reply that a real entity does not occur in that way.üîΩNow, some say that the entity which is the characteristic of awareness is itself expressed by words,

original: de nyid dngos por gyur ba'i gzhan sel ba yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: de nyid dngos por gyur ba'i gzhan sel ba yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: and that it is the exclusion of other which is a real entity.

original: de ni mi bden te /üîΩ'di ltar / de ni mnyan pas brjod pa na //
analyzed: de ni mi bden te / 'di ltar / de ni mnyan pas brjod pa na //
translated: That is not correct.üîΩThus:

original: don gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur //üîΩde ma rtogs na de don can //
analyzed: don gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur // de ma rtogs na de don can //
translated: What part of the object is understood from hearingüîΩthat is not understood, then the one who makes the convention

original: brda byed ba ni don med 'gyur //
analyzed: brda byed ba ni don med 'gyur //
translated: about that would be pointless.

original: ci nas kyang sgra las dngos po'i cha rtogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir brda byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sgra las dngos po'i cha rtogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir brda byed pa yin gyi /
translated: One makes a convention in order that the part of the object be understood from the word,

original: blo'i gzugs brnyan tsam zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i gzugs brnyan tsam zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in order that the mere reflection of awareness be understood.

original: des na brda byed pa ni don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na brda byed pa ni don med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the expression would be meaningless,

original: de ni dngos po rtogs par bya ba'i don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po rtogs par bya ba'i don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is for the purpose of understanding the thing.

original: 'o na ni gzhan sel ba yang sgra'i don ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni gzhan sel ba yang sgra'i don ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: But then the exclusion of other would not be the meaning of the word,

original: des na de la yang brda byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na de la yang brda byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: and therefore the expression would not apply to that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the exclusion of other is a part of the meaning itself.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / sgras don cha ni ci brjod ces //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sgras don cha ni ci brjod ces //
translated: when it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat part of the meaning is expressed by the word?‚Äù

original: de la gzhan sel brjod par bya //
analyzed: de la gzhan sel brjod par bya //
translated: the answer is, ‚ÄúThe exclusion of other.‚Äù

original: rnam pa de yang don la med //
analyzed: rnam pa de yang don la med //
translated: But that aspect does not exist in the meaning,

original: de brjod ji ltar don rten yin //
analyzed: de brjod ji ltar don rten yin //
translated: so how can the expression of that be a basis for the meaning?

original: gal te gzhan sel ba nyid de yin na de'i tshe de rtogs pa na gzhan sel ba don gyi cha nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan sel ba nyid de yin na de'i tshe de rtogs pa na gzhan sel ba don gyi cha nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the exclusion of other itself is that, then when it is understood, the exclusion of other would not be a part of the meaning itself.

original: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid de /
translated: The exclusion of other is a part of the meaning itself.

original: sgras don gyi cha ci zhig brjod ces 'dra ba na /
analyzed: sgras don gyi cha ci zhig brjod ces 'dra ba na /
translated: When it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat part of the meaning is expressed by the word?‚Äù

original: gzhan sel ba'o zhes len 'debs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'o zhes len 'debs pa yin no //
translated: the answer is, ‚ÄúThe exclusion of other.‚Äù

original: rnam pa de yang don la de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa de yang don la de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, that aspect does not exist in the object,

original: blo'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is an aspect of cognition.

original: gang zhig don la yod pa ma yin pa de rtogs pas ni don rtogs par mi 'gyur te /üîΩrab rib can gyis rtogs pa'i skra @243a * //
analyzed: gang zhig don la yod pa ma yin pa de rtogs pas ni don rtogs par mi 'gyur te / rab rib can gyis rtogs pa'i skra @243a * //
translated: If something does not exist in the object, then the object is not cognized by the cognition of that.

original: shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the hair and so on that are cognized by one with eye disease.

original: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba ni spyi yin no zhes 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba ni spyi yin no zhes 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, you assert that the exclusion of other is a universal.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rjes 'gro can sgra rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rjes 'gro can sgra rjes 'gro can //
translated: Sound is seen to follow the universal,

original: don gyi 'bras yin mthong goms pas //
analyzed: don gyi 'bras yin mthong goms pas //
translated: because it is the result of the object, through seeing and becoming familiar with it.

original: sprul de'ang rjes 'gro med ba can //
analyzed: sprul de'ang rjes 'gro med ba can //
translated: That universal also does not follow,

original: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
analyzed: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from the mind.

original: sgra ni khra bo la sogs pa dag la rjes su 'gro bar mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra ni khra bo la sogs pa dag la rjes su 'gro bar mthong ngo //
translated: Sound is seen to follow variegated things and so on.

original: rjes su 'gro ba de yang sbyor bar byed pa rjes su 'gro ba'i don nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba de yang sbyor bar byed pa rjes su 'gro ba'i don nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: That following is a result of the application of the meaning of following.

original: rnam pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin te /
translated: That aspect does not follow,

original: blo las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from the mind.

original: mthong bas goms pas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te blo nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: mthong bas goms pas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te blo nyid bzhin no //
translated: because it is produced by the cultivation of seeing, like the cognition itself.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa rigs pa ma yin te rgyu tha dad pas tha dad par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa rigs pa ma yin te rgyu tha dad pas tha dad par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not reasonable that a result that is not concomitant with its cause would be concomitant with it, because it would be different from the cause, and the different would be the same.

original: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan ni gzhan sel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan ni gzhan sel ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, a reflection is not an other-exclusion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not concomitant.

original: de'i phyir dngos po ni gzhan sel ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po ni gzhan sel ba ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, an entity is not an other-exclusion.

original: blo'i rnam pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i rnam pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is the aspect of cognition.

original: 'o na ji ltar sgra las don rtogs pa na spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgra las don rtogs pa na spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: Well then, how is a universal understood when the meaning of a word is understood?

original: de dngos po la brten pa'i ldog pa rtogs na ni dngos po nyid rtogs pas na de ni spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de dngos po la brten pa'i ldog pa rtogs na ni dngos po nyid rtogs pas na de ni spyi ma yin no //
translated: If the exclusion of other that is based on an entity is understood, then the entity itself is understood, so that is not a universal.

original: de ste dngos po rtogs pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de ste dngos po rtogs pa ma yin na /
translated: But if the entity is not understood,

original: ji ltar gzhan sel ba dngos po'i char rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan sel ba dngos po'i char rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can the exclusion of other that is a part of the entity be understood?

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: The response to that is:

original: de dngos sgro btags rtog pa yis //
analyzed: de dngos sgro btags rtog pa yis //
translated: That is imputed to the entity by thought.

original: gzhan las bzlog pa rtogs phyir yang /üîΩsgra don gang yin de nyid ces //
analyzed: gzhan las bzlog pa rtogs phyir yang / sgra don gang yin de nyid ces //
translated: And because it is the opposite of other,üîΩIt is not contradictory to say

original: brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med //
analyzed: brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med //
translated: That the meaning of a word is that itself.

original: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin du sgro btags pas de dang gcig tu lhag par zhen nas rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin du sgro btags pas de dang gcig tu lhag par zhen nas rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the nature of things is superimposed on the nature of cognition, it is conceived as identical with it,

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimately.

original: de yang gzhan las ldog ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang gzhan las ldog ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And because it is the opposite of other,

original: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba yin no //
translated: the meaning of a word is the exclusion of other.

original: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin de yang thams cad la sgro 'dogs te de'i phyir gzhan sel ba ni spyi dang / dngos po'i cha yin par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin de yang thams cad la sgro 'dogs te de'i phyir gzhan sel ba ni spyi dang / dngos po'i cha yin par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Because it superimposes the nature of things on the nature of cognition, it is conceived as a universal and as a part of a thing.

original: shes pa sgra yis nges sprul pa //
analyzed: shes pa sgra yis nges sprul pa //
translated: Cognition is produced by a word

original: de dag log par snang ba nyid //
analyzed: de dag log par snang ba nyid //
translated: And appears as the opposite of that.

original: don gyi cha la 'di rjes su 'gro //
analyzed: don gyi cha la 'di rjes su 'gro //
translated: It is concomitant with the part of the object.

original: de ltar mnyan pa gzhan sel byed //
analyzed: de ltar mnyan pa gzhan sel byed //
translated: Thus, hearing is the exclusion of other.

original: log par snang ba'i phyir dngos po'i yul can nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: log par snang ba'i phyir dngos po'i yul can nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it appears as the opposite of that, it is not a cognition that has a real thing as its object.

original: gzhan sel ba ni bden pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba ni bden pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the exclusion of other is real.

original: ji ltar dngos po'i rnam pa ltar de la ni gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po'i rnam pa ltar de la ni gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no fault in the form of a real entity.

original: 'di ni gzhan sel ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don gnod par byed pa ni de la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan sel ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don gnod par byed pa ni de la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthis is not the exclusion of other‚Äù is that the fault does not exist in that.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad du gnod par byed pa yod pa dang med pa dag las rtogs pa dang / cig @243b shos su rnam par gzhag gi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad du gnod par byed pa yod pa dang med pa dag las rtogs pa dang / cig @243b shos su rnam par gzhag gi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, conventionally, understanding and non-understanding are established as different in relation to the existence and non-existence of faults, but not ultimately.

original: de'i phyir gzhan sel bar rtogs pa ni gnod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir dang / cig shos ni gnod pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin no zhes khong du chud do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan sel bar rtogs pa ni gnod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir dang / cig shos ni gnod pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin no zhes khong du chud do //
translated: Therefore, since the understanding of the exclusion of other is faultless and the other is faulty, one should understand that the exclusion of other is the meaning of a word.

original: des na gzhan sel ba de ni sgra'i don du 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: des na gzhan sel ba de ni sgra'i don du 'gro ba yin no //
translated: Thus, that exclusion of other is the meaning of a word.

original: sgra ni 'dod pa spangs nas 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra ni 'dod pa spangs nas 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because a word engages by abandoning what is not desired,

original: mnyan pa de ni gzhan sel ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mnyan pa de ni gzhan sel ba byed pa yin no //
translated: that hearing is the exclusion of other.

original: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis gzhan sel ba nyid phyi rol du lhag par zhen par 'gyur ba yin gyi rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis gzhan sel ba nyid phyi rol du lhag par zhen par 'gyur ba yin gyi rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin pas skyon med do //
translated: Or else, the exclusion of other is imagined to be external, by the image of conceptualization, but not by its own nature.

original: de'i phyir sgra la rang gi ngo bos brjod par bya ba ni cung zad kyang med pas sgrub pa ni sgra'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra la rang gi ngo bos brjod par bya ba ni cung zad kyang med pas sgrub pa ni sgra'i don ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since there is not the slightest thing that is expressed by a word by its own nature, the object of a word is not an existent.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid shes pa la snang na ji ltar phyi rol la 'jug ce na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid shes pa la snang na ji ltar phyi rol la 'jug ce na /
translated: If the own nature appears in consciousness, how can it be external?

original: phyi rol du lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the adherence to external things.

original: lhag par zhen ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: lhag par zhen ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is this adherence?

original: de'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du rnam par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du rnam par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the appearance as the object of the convention.

original: de ltar gzhan gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul yin zhe na /
translated: If it is the object of the convention of another,

original: 'dra bas de la rjes su chags pa'i 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dra bas de la rjes su chags pa'i 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is because of the error of attachment to it as similar,

original: rigs 'khrul pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rigs 'khrul pa bzhin no //
translated: like the error of a type.

original: de la rang bzhin gzhan lhag par sgro btags pa lhag par zhen pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin gzhan lhag par sgro btags pa lhag par zhen pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it just a superimposition of a nature that is not there?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: lhag par sgro btags pa yang shes pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag par sgro btags pa yang shes pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the superimposition is a different cognition.

original: gal te des de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na lhag par sgro btags pa ci yod /
analyzed: gal te des de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na lhag par sgro btags pa ci yod /
translated: If it cognizes the nature of that object, what is the superimposition?

original: gzhan du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is a cognition of something else,

original: ci ste gzhan de la yod dam de lta'o zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan de la yod dam de lta'o zhe na /
translated: is that something else existent or non-existent?

original: lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is existent, it is not a superimposition.

original: bden pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: bden pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because it is true.

original: 'on te med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te med do zhe na /
translated: But if it is non-existent,

original: 'o na ni de shes pa tsam zhig yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhan sgro btags pa yin /üîΩgang la de sgro btags par bya ba de yang don gyi rang bzhin nam /
analyzed: 'o na ni de shes pa tsam zhig yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhan sgro btags pa yin / gang la de sgro btags par bya ba de yang don gyi rang bzhin nam /
translated: then how can it be a superimposition of something else, since it is just a cognition?

original: shes pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rung ste /
translated: Moreover, the object of the superimposition is either the nature of the object or the nature of the cognition.

original: de'i tshe de la sgro btags so zhes bya ba'i don ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la sgro btags so zhes bya ba'i don ci zhig yin /
translated: In that case, what is the meaning of the statement ‚ÄúIt is a superimposition on that‚Äù?

original: de la rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la rtogs pa ste /
translated: It is the cognition of that.

original: de dang lhan cig rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe yang lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe yang lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin no //
translated: And when it is realized together with it, it is not an over-estimation.

original: 'on te med pa nyid las yod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te med pa nyid las yod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is realized as existent from non-existence,

original: med pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs //
analyzed: med pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs //
translated: how is it realized as non-existent?

original: de'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhe na //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhe na //
translated: Because its nature is not perceived, it is realized by another.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: de yul ma yin pa'i phyir med par ji ltar rtogs /
analyzed: de yul ma yin pa'i phyir med par ji ltar rtogs /
translated: because it is not its object. How is it realized as non-existent?

original: mi dmigs pa ni spyod yul du gyur pa'i dngos po la go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni spyod yul du gyur pa'i dngos po la go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because non-apprehension is understood in regard to an entity that is within the range of experience.

original: dbang po nyams pa las de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa las de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not realized thus from a defective sense faculty.

original: de ni snga ma med pa nyid rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni snga ma med pa nyid rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: That is the realization of its prior non-existence,

original: med par rtogs pa ni ma @244a * //
analyzed: med par rtogs pa ni ma @244a * //
translated: but not the realization of its non-existence,

original: yin te / de ni de'i tshe nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin te / de ni de'i tshe nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists at that time.

original: 'on te thob par bya ba'i tha snyad byed pa'i phyir thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i tha snyad mi byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te thob par bya ba'i tha snyad byed pa'i phyir thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i tha snyad mi byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the convention of non-attainment is not used because the convention of attainment is used,

original: de ltar na ni 'o na de las gzhan du lhag par sgro 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'o na de las gzhan du lhag par sgro 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If that were so, then since it is a superimposition on that,

original: lhag par sgro 'dogs pa ni gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul du byed pa zhes bya ba de nyid grub pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag par sgro 'dogs pa ni gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul du byed pa zhes bya ba de nyid grub pa yin no //
translated: it is established that the object of other terms is a superimposition.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i don ni gzhan sel ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i don ni gzhan sel ba yin no //
translated: Therefore the meaning of a term is an other-exclusion.

original: de nyid kyi bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bshad pa /
translated: This is explained by that same text:

original: de'i phyir brda yi dus na yang //
analyzed: de'i phyir brda yi dus na yang //
translated: Therefore, even at the time of the convention,

original: rang nyid rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can //
analyzed: rang nyid rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can //
translated: it has the result of understanding itself.

original: bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa yi //
analyzed: bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa yi //
translated: It is related to the meaning that is taught,

original: gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel par 'gyur //
translated: and it is related to the term that excludes other.

original: brdar byed pa na yang brda byed pa po sgrub pa'i sgo nas ni brda byed pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: brdar byed pa na yang brda byed pa po sgrub pa'i sgo nas ni brda byed pa ma yin te ;
translated: Even when a convention is made, the one who makes the convention does not make the convention by way of establishing it;

original: 'on kyang gzhan sel ba'i sgo nas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan sel ba'i sgo nas yin no //
translated: rather, he does so by way of excluding other.

original: gang gi phyir brda'i dus na yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir brda'i dus na yang /
translated: Because even at the time of the convention,

original: gzhan sel ba nyid mnyan pa dang 'brel pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba nyid mnyan pa dang 'brel pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: the exclusion of other is related to the listener, but not to the thing.

original: 'di ni lha sbyin no zhes brda 'dogs pa na /
analyzed: 'di ni lha sbyin no zhes brda 'dogs pa na /
translated: When a convention is made, such as ‚ÄúThis is Devadatta,‚Äù

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na 'brel par mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na 'brel par mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it seen that only their own characteristics are related?

original: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: de na bstan kyang gzugs brnyan kho na rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de na bstan kyang gzugs brnyan kho na rtogs pa yin no //
translated: because even if they are taught, only a reflection is understood.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / brda ni don rtogs don yin par //üîΩgnyi ga yis kyang 'dod pa yin //üîΩgzugs brnyan rtogs 'gyur mngon sum gyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / brda ni don rtogs don yin par // gnyi ga yis kyang 'dod pa yin // gzugs brnyan rtogs 'gyur mngon sum gyi //
translated: both agree that a sign is for understanding a meaning.

original: dngos po nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But a reflection is understood, not the thing itself.

original: 'di'i ming ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i ming ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is its name,

original: 'di las ni dus gzhan du yang 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes brda ni de las gzhan pa'i dus kyi rtogs pa'i gnas skabs khyab pa nyid du rang dang gzhan gnyi ga yang gdon mi za bar 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di las ni dus gzhan du yang 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes brda ni de las gzhan pa'i dus kyi rtogs pa'i gnas skabs khyab pa nyid du rang dang gzhan gnyi ga yang gdon mi za bar 'dod pa yin no //
translated: and it is to be understood from this at another time. Thus, both oneself and others certainly agree that a sign is the basis for understanding at another time, which is pervaded by that.

original: des na mnyan pa dang gzhan sel ba nyid 'brel pa yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mnyan pa dang gzhan sel ba nyid 'brel pa yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, hearing and exclusion are the relation, not the own characteristic.

original: ci ste 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes gzugs brnyan khyad par yin par ni rtogs pa med kyi 'on kyang 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kho na brda'i yul nyid du rtogs so snyam na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes gzugs brnyan khyad par yin par ni rtogs pa med kyi 'on kyang 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kho na brda'i yul nyid du rtogs so snyam na ma yin te /
translated: But if you think that you do not understand the reflection to be a particular, but rather that you understand the intrinsic identity of the reflection to be the referent of the name, this is not so.

original: shin tu goms pa'am rtog pa sngon du gtong ba can ma yin pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: shin tu goms pa'am rtog pa sngon du gtong ba can ma yin pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: You understand it in this way because you are very familiar with it, or because you do not engage in prior analysis.

original: bzlog pas ni nges pa kho nar gzugs brnyan du rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pas ni nges pa kho nar gzugs brnyan du rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But if you do the opposite, you definitely understand it to be a reflection.

original: yang gang zhig tha snyad las brdar rtogs pa dang ldan pa de ni nges par brda'i dus kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid lhag par zhen par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang gang zhig tha snyad las brdar rtogs pa dang ldan pa de ni nges par brda'i dus kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid lhag par zhen par byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, one who understands a name from convention definitely conceives the intrinsic identity of the reflection at the time of the name.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / 'di ming 'di yi brda 'di las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di ming 'di yi brda 'di las //
translated: From this name, this convention,

original: 'di ni rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: 'di ni rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: this is understood.

original: 'di ni rtog ldan nyid yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni rtog ldan nyid yin te //
translated: This is the possessor of the idea,

original: gzhan du rtog ldan ji ltar yin //
analyzed: gzhan du rtog ldan ji ltar yin //
translated: but how is the other the possessor of the idea?

original: de bzhin du 'di 'on cig ces brjod pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di 'on cig ces brjod pa las /
translated: Likewise, when someone says, ‚ÄúBring that,‚Äù

original: de log par ni @244b mthong ba na //
analyzed: de log par ni @244b mthong ba na //
translated: and one sees that [object] is not that,

original: 'di ming 'di yin bdag gis kyang //
analyzed: 'di ming 'di yin bdag gis kyang //
translated: one thinks, ‚ÄúThis is called that,‚Äù

original: sgra 'di las ni 'di rtogs bya //
analyzed: sgra 'di las ni 'di rtogs bya //
translated: and one understands that from the word.

original: yang na bstan pa ni sngar bshad zin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa yin la /
analyzed: yang na bstan pa ni sngar bshad zin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the teaching is the reflection that was explained earlier.

original: de ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhan sel ba ni de dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: de ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhan sel ba ni de dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The other-exclusion that is the nature of its negation is related to that.

original: gzugs brnyan de'i 'bras bu yang gzhan sel ba rtogs pa nyid yin gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de'i 'bras bu yang gzhan sel ba rtogs pa nyid yin gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The result of that reflection is the understanding of other-exclusion itself, but not the understanding of its own nature,

original: rang gi ngo bo ni don la med pa'i phyir dang / ldog pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni don la med pa'i phyir dang / ldog pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its own nature does not exist in the object, and because the negation does exist.

original: ldog pa de ni gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ldog pa de ni gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that negation is different from that,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: rtogs pas bkar nas de dang gcig par tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: rtogs pas bkar nas de dang gcig par tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because the understanding explicitly makes the convention of sameness with that.

original: gzhan yang / gzhan du ma ma mthong la ltos dang // la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan du ma ma mthong la ltos dang // la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
translated: Moreover, because of seeing difference in some cases and not seeing it in other cases,

original: gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: gzhan sel sgra dang 'brel 'gyur gyi //
translated: other-exclusion is related to words.

original: de ni dngos la mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ni dngos la mi rung ngo //
translated: But that is not so in reality.

original: sgra ni de dang rigs mi mthun pa gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i rigs can 'ga' zhig la mthong ba'i phyir gzhan sel ba nyid la brdar 'dogs pa yin no zhes shes so //
analyzed: sgra ni de dang rigs mi mthun pa gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i rigs can 'ga' zhig la mthong ba'i phyir gzhan sel ba nyid la brdar 'dogs pa yin no zhes shes so //
translated: One understands that the convention is established in the exclusion of other, because sound is not seen in other things that are not of its type, and because it is seen in some things that are of its type.

original: spyi'am gsal ba la brda 'dogs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'am gsal ba la brda 'dogs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: Why is it not the case that the convention is established in a universal or an individual?

original: de ltar gyur na sgrub pa'i tshul kho nas brdar btags pa'i phyir thams cad la mthong bar thal lo //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na sgrub pa'i tshul kho nas brdar btags pa'i phyir thams cad la mthong bar thal lo //
translated: It is not so, because if that were so, then it would follow that all things would be seen, since the convention is established by the mode of affirmation.

original: spyi la yin na yang /
analyzed: spyi la yin na yang /
translated: Even if it were a universal,

original: mthong ba tsam la ltos par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba tsam la ltos par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would depend on mere seeing, but it would not depend on not seeing other things.

original: spyi ldog pa dang bcas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: spyi ldog pa dang bcas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is to be understood as having a universal that is distinguished.

original: 'o na ni de las gzhan las ldog pa de nyid yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni de las gzhan las ldog pa de nyid yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Well then, it would be that very distinction from other things,

original: spyi btags pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: spyi btags pas ci zhig bya /
translated: so what use is a universal that is imputed?

original: gsal ba nyid de las gzhan las ldog pa dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur gyi spyis ci bya /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid de las gzhan las ldog pa dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur gyi spyis ci bya /
translated: What use is a universal that is distinct from the individual?

original: gsal ba nyid ni mi rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni mi rtogs so zhe na /
translated: But the individual itself is not understood.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: gsal ba med par spyi rtogs pas kyang ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gsal ba med par spyi rtogs pas kyang ci zhig bya /
translated: What use is a universal that is understood without the individual?

original: mtshon zin pas mtshon pa'i phyir gsal ba yang rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: mtshon zin pas mtshon pa'i phyir gsal ba yang rtogs so zhe na /
translated: But the individual is also understood because it is indicated by the universal.

original: ci 'dir gnyis rim gyis rtogs sam /üîΩrtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: ci 'dir gnyis rim gyis rtogs sam / rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Is it that the two are understood in sequence?üîΩOr is it that the individual is understood by the universal?

original: dang po ni ba lang nyid tsam rtogs pas yul du byed la /
analyzed: dang po ni ba lang nyid tsam rtogs pas yul du byed la /
translated: In the first case, since the universal alone is understood, it is the object.

original: de'i 'og tu ni khra bo la sogs pa'i khyad par ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni khra bo la sogs pa'i khyad par ro zhe na /
translated: Then later, the distinctions such as being multicolored are understood.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: khra bo la sogs pa rnams kyi nang gi khyad par rtogs pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa rnams kyi nang gi khyad par rtogs pa ni mi srid do //
translated: It is impossible to understand the distinctions among multicolored things and so on.

original: des na de yang spyi nyid do //üîΩde'i phyir gsal pa rnams ni spyis mtshon pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de yang spyi nyid do // de'i phyir gsal pa rnams ni spyis mtshon pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, that also is a universal.

original: spyi nyid mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi nyid mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the individual is not indicated by the universal because the universal itself is indicated.

original: gdon mi za bar 'dir khyad par 'ga' zhig yod dgos so zhes mtshon pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'dir khyad par 'ga' zhig yod dgos so zhes mtshon pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: Surely, there must be some difference here.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, there is not,

original: de la sgra'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di la rtogs pa yin nam /
analyzed: de la sgra'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro // 'di la rtogs pa yin nam /
translated: because there is no function of the word in that.

original: 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma med do //üîΩspyi yang mtshan nyid du @245a * //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma med do // spyi yang mtshan nyid du @245a * //
translated: There is no means of valid knowledge here to determine whether or not there is an understanding.

original: gyur pa ni rtogs pa med do //üîΩdes na dngos po dang bral pa'i phyir de ni blo nyid do //
analyzed: gyur pa ni rtogs pa med do // des na dngos po dang bral pa'i phyir de ni blo nyid do //
translated: Nor is there an understanding of a universal that is a characteristic.

original: phyir de ni blo nyid do //
analyzed: phyir de ni blo nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because it is devoid of an entity, it is just an understanding.

original: 'o na ji ltar gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin zhe na /
translated: How then is the exclusion of other the meaning of a word?

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because of that,

original: gzhan las ldog pa kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it engages only in the exclusion of other.

original: gal te spyi'am gsal ba rtogs pa yin na ni slu bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te spyi'am gsal ba rtogs pa yin na ni slu bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If there were an understanding of a universal or an instance, there would be no deception,

original: rtogs pa la ni slu ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa la ni slu ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because there is no deception in an understanding.

original: slu bar gyur na gzhan las ldog pa yang sgra'i don du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: slu bar gyur na gzhan las ldog pa yang sgra'i don du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If there were deception, how could the exclusion of other be the meaning of a word?

original: gzhan mthong yang de las gzhan len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan mthong yang de las gzhan len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even when seeing another, one grasps something other than that.

original: re zhig de ni blangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig de ni blangs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is taken up at that time.

original: gzhan blang dgos so zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni med do //
analyzed: gzhan blang dgos so zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni med do //
translated: There is no certainty that it must be taken up elsewhere.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgra'i rtogs pa dang rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgra'i rtogs pa dang rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
translated: For that very reason, because it is similar to the understanding of a word,

original: rjes su dpag pa yang rnam par gcod pa tsam zhig gi sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang rnam par gcod pa tsam zhig gi sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: inference also is a proof of mere exclusion.üîΩOr,üîΩsee that it is not seen elsewhere.

original: yang na / gzhan du ma mthong la ltos dang // zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi brda 'dzin pa na /
analyzed: yang na / gzhan du ma mthong la ltos dang // zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi brda 'dzin pa na /
translated: When one grasps the conventional symbol,

original: gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos pa dang / rigs mthun pa 'ga' zhig la mthong ba la ltos nas brda 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos pa dang / rigs mthun pa 'ga' zhig la mthong ba la ltos nas brda 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
translated: one grasps the symbol in dependence on not seeing it elsewhere and in dependence on seeing it in some similar class.

original: des na gang la de ma mthong ba de thams cad ni rnam par bcad pa shes pa yin la /üîΩgang la tha snyad mthong ba de ni yod dam /
analyzed: des na gang la de ma mthong ba de thams cad ni rnam par bcad pa shes pa yin la / gang la tha snyad mthong ba de ni yod dam /
translated: Therefore, that which is not seen there is known as excluded from everything.

original: 'on te med ces bye brag tu mi rtogs so //
analyzed: 'on te med ces bye brag tu mi rtogs so //
translated: But that which is seen as a convention is not distinguished as existent or nonexistent.

original: 'di ltar brda 'dzin pa ni de kho na ltar yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar brda 'dzin pa ni de kho na ltar yin no //
translated: Thus, the grasping of the symbol is just like that.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: For what reason?

original: dngos po 'di 'on cig ces bya ba'i ngag gi byed pa ni len pa la yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po 'di 'on cig ces bya ba'i ngag gi byed pa ni len pa la yin gyi /
translated: The function of the sentence ‚ÄúBring this thing‚Äù is to take up,

original: dngos po yod pa nyid la ni ma yin no//
analyzed: dngos po yod pa nyid la ni ma yin no//
translated: not to bring into existence that which exists.

original: med pa ni blang bar mi nus so zhe na /
analyzed: med pa ni blang bar mi nus so zhe na /
translated: But one cannot take up that which does not exist!

original: gal te 'di rgyal po'i bka' yin na ni de'i tshe gor ma chag par khyer 'ongs dgos so //üîΩde ni yongs su brtag pa na tshad ma gzhan nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di rgyal po'i bka' yin na ni de'i tshe gor ma chag par khyer 'ongs dgos so // de ni yongs su brtag pa na tshad ma gzhan nam /
translated: If this is the king‚Äôs order, then without doubt it must be brought.üîΩWhen it is investigated, it is known to exist by another means of valid knowledge,

original: don gyis go ba las yod pa nyid du rtogs pas yul du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: don gyis go ba las yod pa nyid du rtogs pas yul du byed pa yin no //
translated: or by implication. Thus it is the object.

original: don gyis go ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra ni yod pa nyid la tshad ma yin no zhe na /üîΩdon gyis go ba med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: don gyis go ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra ni yod pa nyid la tshad ma yin no zhe na / don gyis go ba med pa'i phyir na /
translated: If you say that the sound together with the implication is the means of valid knowledge of existence,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then it is not so, because there is no implication.

original: 'di ni byis pa mngon par 'dod pa slong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni byis pa mngon par 'dod pa slong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is like a child‚Äôs demand for something he wants.

original: des na yod pa srid na len pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na yod pa srid na len pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if existence is possible, it is taken up, not otherwise.

original: gzhan ni mi len pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan ni mi len pa nyid do //
translated: The other is not taken up.

original: yang gzhan dag ni rigs mi mthun pa thams cad ldog pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu bsgrub par 'jug pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag ni rigs mi mthun pa thams cad ldog pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu bsgrub par 'jug pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, others say that the reason is not established because it is dependent on the exclusion of all dissimilar instances and the establishment of some instances.

original: ldog pa lhu che ba yin gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin pas ldog pa nyid gtsor rtogs so zhe'o //
analyzed: ldog pa lhu che ba yin gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin pas ldog pa nyid gtsor rtogs so zhe'o //
translated: Since the exclusion is the major part, and the inclusion is not the main thing, the exclusion is understood to be the main thing.

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gcig gtsor gyur pa yin du chug kyang /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gcig gtsor gyur pa yin du chug kyang /
translated: Even if it were the case that one of the inclusion and the exclusion is the main thing,

original: de lta na yang sgra'i don sgrub pa yin pa las ni 'das pa ma yin no zhes bya bas tha ma rjes @245b su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin par rtogs par yang mi nus so //
analyzed: de lta na yang sgra'i don sgrub pa yin pa las ni 'das pa ma yin no zhes bya bas tha ma rjes @245b su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin par rtogs par yang mi nus so //
translated: still, since the meaning of the word is established from the exclusion, it cannot be understood that the inclusion is the main thing.

original: gsal ba gcig mthong bas kyang spyi'i bdag nyid thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsal ba gcig mthong bas kyang spyi'i bdag nyid thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because even when one instance is seen, the whole universal is understood.

original: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore it is not correct to say that the inclusion is not the main thing.üîΩOr,

original: yang na / la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
analyzed: yang na / la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
translated: because it is seen in some places and not in others,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ming yin no zhes bya bas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ming yin no zhes bya bas /
translated: this is its name.

original: thams cad kyi tshe sgra sbyor ba la don yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe sgra sbyor ba la don yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: But it is not that the application of a term is always meaningful.

original: 'di'i ming 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'di la tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes de tsam zhig la yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i ming 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'di la tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes de tsam zhig la yin te /
translated: It is only to the extent that one knows, ‚ÄúThis is the name of this object,‚Äù that one knows, ‚ÄúThis term is applied to this object.‚Äù

original: gzhan du tha snyad med pa'i phyir sgra rnams ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du tha snyad med pa'i phyir sgra rnams ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
translated: Because there is no other way to apply terms, terms have the object of the exclusion of other.

original: ci ste gang du rjes su dpag pas dngos po thob par 'gyur ba na /
analyzed: ci ste gang du rjes su dpag pas dngos po thob par 'gyur ba na /
translated: But if one obtains an object through inference,

original: shes pa de ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes pa de ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin par 'gyur te /
translated: how can that cognition be one that has the exclusion of other as its object?

original: de la yang gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: For, even in that case, it is maintained that it has the exclusion of other as its object.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: der yang khyad par la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang khyad par la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even in that case, there is doubt about the distinction.

original: der ni 'di ltar rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: der ni 'di ltar rtogs pa yin te /
translated: In that case, the understanding is as follows:

original: re zhig 'di me yin par ni 'gyur na /
analyzed: re zhig 'di me yin par ni 'gyur na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf this is fire,
