original: me ci lta bu yin pa mi shes so //
analyzed: me ci lta bu yin pa mi shes so //
translated: then I do not know what kind of fire it is.‚Äù

original: gal te spyi yongs su ma bcad na ji ltar me'i khyad par la the tshom za bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi yongs su ma bcad na ji ltar me'i khyad par la the tshom za bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the universal is not determined, how can there be doubt about the particular?

original: rtogs pa tsam gyis the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam gyis the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is doubt about the mere apprehension.

original: re zhig rtogs pa de ni yod pa yin na /üîΩci me yod dam 'on te med ce'am /
analyzed: re zhig rtogs pa de ni yod pa yin na / ci me yod dam 'on te med ce'am /
translated: If the apprehension exists,üîΩthen there is doubt about the existence of fire,

original: de la me ji lta bu zhig yod ces khyad par mi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de la me ji lta bu zhig yod ces khyad par mi shes pa yin no //
translated: but not about the particular, as to whether it is this or that.

original: gang du yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yod pa der me nges par yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gang du yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yod pa der me nges par yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: In every case, where there is an inference from an effect, is fire not necessarily present?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: me ni reg pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me ni reg pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because fire is a particular kind of contact.

original: de la ni nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la ni nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And there is no certainty about that.

original: ji ltar me rtogs /
analyzed: ji ltar me rtogs /
translated: How is fire apprehended?

original: dro ba tsam zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dro ba tsam zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because mere heat is apprehended.

original: spyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the universal is apprehended,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: khyad par gyi rim pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi rim pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a particular kind of sequence.

original: khyad par gyi rim pa las sogs pa'i bye brag las tha dad pa'i dro ba'i spyi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par gyi rim pa las sogs pa'i bye brag las tha dad pa'i dro ba'i spyi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The universal of heat, which is different from the particular sequence, etc.,

original: yod pa na yin no //
analyzed: yod pa na yin no //
translated: It exists when it is present.

original: de yang rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: de yang rtogs pa med do //
translated: But that is not perceived.

original: rtogs pa yang khyad par gyi rim pa nyid dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtogs pa yang khyad par gyi rim pa nyid dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And if you say that the order of distinction is perceived,

original: dmigs la ni rag na blo gcig nyid ni med de /
analyzed: dmigs la ni rag na blo gcig nyid ni med de /
translated: then, even if it is perceived, there is no single cognition,

original: res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu zhes blo gzhan skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu zhes blo gzhan skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because sometimes one cognition arises, sometimes another.

original: gcig nyid dus gcig gi tshe rang bzhin du mar dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gcig nyid dus gcig gi tshe rang bzhin du mar dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that a single cognition is perceived as having multiple natures at one time,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: gdon mi za bar gcig ni mi bden par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar gcig ni mi bden par 'gyur ro //
translated: For then one of them would certainly be false.

original: de'i phyir der yang rtogs pa tsam zhig bden pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir der yang rtogs pa tsam zhig bden pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pas /
translated: Therefore, even there, only the mere cognition is true, not the other.

original: gzhan sel ba tsam gzhig sgra dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba tsam gzhig sgra dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the mere exclusion of other is the object of words and inference.

original: dngos po la ni de 'thad pa ma yin no //üîΩgzhan sel ba @246a * //
analyzed: dngos po la ni de 'thad pa ma yin no // gzhan sel ba @246a * //
translated: But that is not tenable with regard to an entity.üîΩAnd the exclusion of other is also related to the reason.

original: ni rtags la'ang 'brel pa yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //üîΩde'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan ni //
analyzed: ni rtags la'ang 'brel pa yin no zhes blta bar bya'o // de'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan ni //
translated: This should be understood.

original: yod min don dang de dag la //
analyzed: yod min don dang de dag la //
translated: Therefore, the existence of that which possesses the universal, etc.üîΩis not tenable in reality.

original: mnyan pa 'brel min gzhan las ni //
analyzed: mnyan pa 'brel min gzhan las ni //
translated: But the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not connected with the other,

original: ldog pa nyid la sgra sbyor phyir //
analyzed: ldog pa nyid la sgra sbyor phyir //
translated: because it is applied to the negation.

original: des na tshad ma med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: des na tshad ma med pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, because there is no valid cognition,

original: rigs la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: there is no understanding of the relation of universals, etc.

original: rdzas 'brel pa yang rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid la ci zhig yod /
analyzed: rdzas 'brel pa yang rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid la ci zhig yod /
translated: And what is the relation of substance, since it appears by its own nature?

original: ldan par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ldan par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say: ‚ÄúBecause it appears as related,‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: gzhan rtogs pas rnam par rtog par mi byed kyang de'i ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs pas rnam par rtog par mi byed kyang de'i ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it appears as that nature, even though it does not conceive the other.

original: de tsam 'ba' zhig gis rtogs par srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam 'ba' zhig gis rtogs par srid pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to understand it merely from that.

original: de nyid la rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid la rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say: ‚ÄúIt is understood in that,‚Äù

original: 'dod pa'i phyir gnod pa ci yod gnyi ga las skyes pa dang / gang yang rung ba'i las skyes pa dang ldan pa las skyes pa zhes ni rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir gnod pa ci yod gnyi ga las skyes pa dang / gang yang rung ba'i las skyes pa dang ldan pa las skyes pa zhes ni rtogs pa med do //
translated: what is the harm? There is no understanding of the relation as arising from both, or arising from either, or arising from possession.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam du rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam du rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say: ‚ÄúIt is understood as mere nature,‚Äù

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: ldan pa'i rang gi ngo bo snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pa'i rang gi ngo bo snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of possession does not appear.

original: dngos po gnyis kho nar de ltar skyes pa'i snang ba yin gyi ldan pa'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gnyis kho nar de ltar skyes pa'i snang ba yin gyi ldan pa'i ni ma yin no //
translated: The appearance of the two things is just like that, but there is no inherence.

original: dngos po gnyis po de nyid ldan pa yin no zhes rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gnyis po de nyid ldan pa yin no zhes rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is there the cognition of the two things as inherence.

original: des na ldan pa gzhan ni med de snga ma dang lhan cig gcig tu rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na ldan pa gzhan ni med de snga ma dang lhan cig gcig tu rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, there is no other inherence, because there is no cognition of the one as prior and the other as subsequent.

original: mngon sum ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Direct perception does not operate on the prior and subsequent things.

original: snga ma rtogs par ma gyur mod //
analyzed: snga ma rtogs par ma gyur mod //
translated: The prior is not yet cognized.

original: de lta na yang ldan pa rtogs pa ni yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang ldan pa rtogs pa ni yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Even so, there is the cognition of inherence.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, there is not.

original: mi ldan pa las ldan 'gyur te //
analyzed: mi ldan pa las ldan 'gyur te //
translated: Because there is no inherence prior to the inherence of the inherent.

original: de ni slar yang 'brel par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni slar yang 'brel par 'gyur //
translated: That would be the reconnection of what was previously disconnected.

original: gcig dgos byed mkhan nga yin zhes //
analyzed: gcig dgos byed mkhan nga yin zhes //
translated: The cognition of the one as ‚ÄúI am the one who needs to be done‚Äù

original: de ni rtogs par 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: de ni rtogs par 'dod pa yin //
translated: is the desire to cognize that.

original: gal te de ltar ma rtogs na //
analyzed: gal te de ltar ma rtogs na //
translated: If it is not cognized in that way,

original: ldan par rtog pa don med 'gyur //
analyzed: ldan par rtog pa don med 'gyur //
translated: the conception of inherence would be pointless.

original: 'di ni gcig 'gyur de yi phyir //
analyzed: 'di ni gcig 'gyur de yi phyir //
translated: This would be the one, and therefore

original: ldan pa don ldan 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ldan pa don ldan 'gyur ba yin //
translated: the inherence would be meaningful.

original: sgra sbyor bar byed pa yang med de /
analyzed: sgra sbyor bar byed pa yang med de /
translated: And there is no one who makes the connection,

original: sgra de la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra de la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word does not exist.

original: brda'i dus na sgra yod par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brda'i dus na sgra yod par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the word exists at the time of the convention,üîΩthen there is no one who makes the connection,üîΩbecause the word does not exist at the time of the convention.

original: de dang sbyor bar byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang sbyor bar byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And the word does not exist at the time of the perception,

original: 'di ltar / brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyi //üîΩmthong ba sre byed bdag nyid can //üîΩsnga phyi stong bas 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyi // mthong ba sre byed bdag nyid can // snga phyi stong bas 'dzin pa yi //
translated: because the word is the cause of the memory of the convention.

original: mig shes la ni de ji ltar //üîΩ'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba 'di ba lang gi sgra nyid ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig shes la ni de ji ltar // 'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba 'di ba lang gi sgra nyid ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The perception is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.

original: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word is the cause of the memory.

original: gzhi mthun pa ni de dang 'brel pa las te /üîΩdper na dbyig pa zhugs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa ni de dang 'brel pa las te / dper na dbyig pa zhugs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: The word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.üîΩThe word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause of the memory.

original: yang na gang la ba lang gi sgra yod pa de ba lang gi sgra yin no //üîΩde la gang gi tshe sbyor bas phyogs gcig la 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya ba de la ni /
analyzed: yang na gang la ba lang gi sgra yod pa de ba lang gi sgra yin no //üîΩde la gang gi tshe sbyor bas phyogs gcig la 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya ba de la ni /
translated: The word is the cause of the perception.üîΩThe word is the cause

original: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod @246b par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod @246b par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the referent of the word ‚Äúcow,‚Äù

original: ba lang gi sgra las 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra las 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is understood from the word ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: ba lang de ni 'di'o zhes bya bar ni 'di la ba lang gi brdar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: ba lang de ni 'di'o zhes bya bar ni 'di la ba lang gi brdar btags pa yin no //
translated: But the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is a conventional designation for that cow.

original: de lta bu'i dngos po de ni snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pas stong pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum gyis ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dngos po de ni snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pas stong pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum gyis ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: How can that entity, which is empty of the nature of being apprehended by the prior and subsequent moments of perception, be apprehended by direct perception?üîΩAs it has been said:

original: 'di ltar / dbang rnams rung ba'i yul gnas la //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dbang rnams rung ba'i yul gnas la //
translated: The sense faculties engage their objects that are present,

original: 'byung 'gyur 'das dang 'byung la min //üîΩdbang po la brten rnam shes kyi //
analyzed: 'byung 'gyur 'das dang 'byung la min // dbang po la brten rnam shes kyi //
translated: not those that are past or future.üîΩThe sense faculties are the dominant conditions

original: spyod yul dbang po'i byed can yin //
analyzed: spyod yul dbang po'i byed can yin //
translated: for the sense consciousnesses, whose objects are the sense faculties‚Äô domain.

original: zhes de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes de ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po snga ma dang phyi ma dag la yang 'jug ba yin na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po snga ma dang phyi ma dag la yang 'jug ba yin na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: If the prior and subsequent moments of the sense faculties such as the eyes engage their objects, then all past and future objects would be cognized,

original: thams cad 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all objects are related to some object in some way.

original: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the realization of the object that was previously apprehended,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no realization at all times.

original: dran pa yod na 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dran pa yod na 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is when memory exists,

original: dran pa nyid de yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nyid de yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then memory itself would be that.

original: dran par bya ba dang lhan cig mngon sum gyis gcig tu rtogs pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: dran par bya ba dang lhan cig mngon sum gyis gcig tu rtogs pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the realization of the object of memory together with the memory itself,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because memory is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: dran par bya ba mi bden pa nyid de dang lhan cig tu rtogs pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: dran par bya ba mi bden pa nyid de dang lhan cig tu rtogs pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could the realization of the object of memory, which is not true, be true?

original: ci ste yang de'i don bya ba byed pa'i phyir de nyid 'di yin no zhe na /üîΩdon bya ba zhes pa dang / de'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid yin nam /
analyzed: ci ste yang de'i don bya ba byed pa'i phyir de nyid 'di yin no zhe na / don bya ba zhes pa dang / de'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid yin nam /
translated: But if you say that it is that itself because it performs the function of the object,üîΩis the function of the object the object itself?

original: de nyid kyis don bya dgos so zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: de nyid kyis don bya dgos so zhes bya ba las /
translated: Or is it that the object must perform a function?

original: de'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad kyi ;
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad kyi ;
translated: Therefore, this is mere convention.

original: gcig nyid du 'dzin pa la tshad ma ni med do //
analyzed: gcig nyid du 'dzin pa la tshad ma ni med do //
translated: There is no valid knowledge that apprehends it as one.

original: tha snyad mi slu ba nyid las tshad mar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tha snyad mi slu ba nyid las tshad mar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is a valid cognition because it is nondeceptive with regard to the conventional.

original: gcig nyid la ni mi slu ba yod ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gcig nyid la ni mi slu ba yod ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Nondeceptiveness does not exist in the one,

original: 'on kyang don bya ba la yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang don bya ba la yin te /
translated: but it does exist with regard to the object to be attained.

original: de ni yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ni yod pa kho na'o //
translated: It does exist.

original: de'i don nyid ni don bya ba byed pa las yin gyi snga ma dang gcig nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i don nyid ni don bya ba byed pa las yin gyi snga ma dang gcig nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The object to be attained is attained, but not the former one.

original: ci ste de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i mtshams sbyor ba 'di ni yod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ste de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i mtshams sbyor ba 'di ni yod pa yin no //
translated: But if it is the same, then the connection is established.

original: gal te snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig pa nyid med na mtshams sbyor bar byed pa po nyid du su zhig 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig pa nyid med na mtshams sbyor bar byed pa po nyid du su zhig 'gyur /
translated: If the former and latter are not the same, then who would be the connector?

original: mtshams sbyor ba po gcig nyid yin na snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa'i mngon sum mtshams sbyor ba po la brten pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba po gcig nyid yin na snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa'i mngon sum mtshams sbyor ba po la brten pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the connector is the same, then the former and latter are apprehended by the direct perception that is based on the connector.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not.

original: dran ba dang mthong ba'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran ba dang mthong ba'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other connection apart from the aspects of memory and seeing.

original: gal te mngon sum pa dag la brten pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum pa dag la brten pa yin yang /
translated: Even if it is based on direct perception,

original: de tsam gyis ni de tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni de tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not a valid cognition merely by that.

original: dbang po la brten pas na tshad ma yin la bdag la brten pas ni gcig nyid du 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po la brten pas na tshad ma yin la bdag la brten pas ni gcig nyid du 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a valid cognition because it is based on the sense faculties, but it grasps as one because it is based on the self,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brangs nas @247a * //
analyzed: de ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brangs nas @247a * //
translated: Because it engages following the sense faculties,

original: 'jug pa'i phyir dang / dbang po yang snga ma dang phyi ma la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i phyir dang / dbang po yang snga ma dang phyi ma la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the sense faculties do not engage in the past or future.

original: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i shes pa ni 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i shes pa ni 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that the consciousness that follows it engages,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that it follows it.

original: sten gyi shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa med par ni snga ma la shes pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sten gyi shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa med par ni snga ma la shes pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Without following the consciousness of the present, consciousness does not engage in the past.

original: de las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bab chol yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bab chol yin no //
translated: To say that it follows something other than that is mere prattle.

original: gcig nyid du rtogs pa ni dbang po med par mi 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig nyid du rtogs pa ni dbang po med par mi 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: The realization of one is not without a sense faculty.

original: des ni gcig nyid du rtogs pa dbang po las skyes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des ni gcig nyid du rtogs pa dbang po las skyes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the cognition of oneness does not arise from the sense faculty.

original: mngon sum las 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum las 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is a transformation of perception.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: gcig nyid las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference in the oneness.

original: gsal ba nyid kyis khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid kyis khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But there is a difference in the clarity.

original: gsal ba nyid gcig yin la rag mod /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid gcig yin la rag mod /
translated: Granted, there is clarity, but

original: mi gsal ba dang gcig nyid du go mngon sum gyis ji ltar khong du chud /
analyzed: mi gsal ba dang gcig nyid du go mngon sum gyis ji ltar khong du chud /
translated: how can perception understand that it is one with the unclear?

original: de ni 'di dang gcig par mngon sum gyis khong du chud pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni 'di dang gcig par mngon sum gyis khong du chud pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that perception understands that it is one with that.

original: 'di go de dang ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di go de dang ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
translated: But how is it not one with that?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are similar.

original: gnyi ga mngon sum gyis gzung ba med par de gcig par mngon sum gyis ji ltar yul du byed /
analyzed: gnyi ga mngon sum gyis gzung ba med par de gcig par mngon sum gyis ji ltar yul du byed /
translated: If both are not apprehended by perception, how can perception make the object one?

original: gcig nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin gyi don ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gcig nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin gyi don ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Perception apprehends oneness, not the object.

original: 'o na gcig nyid de don la brten pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na gcig nyid de don la brten pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Well then, oneness would not be based on the object.

original: gcig nyid dang brgyud pa med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa 'phen pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gcig nyid dang brgyud pa med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa 'phen pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it is neither identical nor a continuum, it is the impellor.

original: 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúImpellor‚Äù is an inference.

original: des na mngon sum gyis rang dbang du bzung ba la rjes su dpag pas gzhan du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis rang dbang du bzung ba la rjes su dpag pas gzhan du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that inference apprehends something else, that is, that which is grasped by the independent perception.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because inference is preceded by perception.

original: des na mngon sum gyis ni 'di ba lang ngo zhes rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyis ni 'di ba lang ngo zhes rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, perception does not understand ‚ÄúThis is a cow.‚Äù

original: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it does not apprehend the prior and subsequent parts.

original: gzhan yang shi ba la yang snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang shi ba la yang snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, since the prior and subsequent parts are apprehended in a corpse,

original: de ji ltar 'di tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'di tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: how could it not be a valid cognition?

original: de'i phyir nye bar gnas pa 'dzin pa tsam kho na tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar gnas pa 'dzin pa tsam kho na tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the mere apprehension of that which is present is a valid cognition.

original: de la yang sbyor bar byed pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la yang sbyor bar byed pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: And since there is no application in that,

original: dbang po'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa yin no //
translated: The sense consciousnesses are nonconceptual.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang //
translated: The mind that engages other objects

original: mig gis gzugs dag mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs dag mthong gyur pa //
translated: Is not the one that sees the forms.

original: der ni gsal bar de yi brda //
analyzed: der ni gsal bar de yi brda //

translated: Is not the one that sees the forms.üîΩThe memory that arises from that

analyzed: rnam rtog bcas pa nyid yin na //
translated: The memory that arises from

original: grub pa la sgrub gzhan du na //
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub gzhan du na //

original: 'gal bar gnas pa 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: 'gal bar gnas pa 'gyur ba yin //

analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa gzhan dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is associated with another conceptualization, then it is associated with conceptualization.üîΩIf it is established as something other than the establishment, then it is established as something other than the establishment.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na ni /üîΩde lta bur gyur pa la dran pa lhan cig byed pa yin par grub pa la sgrub po //

analyzed: sngar gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa yang gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.üîΩIf it is associated with itself, then it is not established.

original: de lta yin na ni khyed kyi ngo shes pa nyams pa yin no //üîΩha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad zin to //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni khyed kyi ngo shes pa nyams pa yin no // ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad zin to //
translated: If it is associated with itself, then it is not established.

original: de'i phyir lhan cig gi tshe /
analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig gi tshe /
translated: If it is associated with itself, then it is not established

original: sems gzhan du song ba'i gnas skabs su rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi tshe yang de lta bu kho na yin par rigs so //
analyzed: sems gzhan du song ba'i gnas skabs su rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi tshe yang de lta bu kho na yin par rigs so //
translated: When the mind is in another state, it is devoid of conceptualization. It is reasonable that it is just like that at other times as well.

original: 'on te rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if it is conceptual because of another conceptualization,

original: de lta yin na ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta yin na ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin par 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be conceptual even in relation to auditory consciousness,

original: rna ba yang lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rna ba yang lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ear is a co-operating condition.

original: 'on te shes pa de gnyis ni tha dad pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa de gnyis ni tha dad pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But if those two consciousnesses are different,

original: gzhan du yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
analyzed: gzhan du yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
translated: there is no difference, because the same is true of other states.

original: 'on te gnas skabs de na rnam par rtog pa gzhan yang yod do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gnas skabs de na rnam par rtog pa gzhan yang yod do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that there is another conceptualization in that state,

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: that is not correct,

original: ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not perceived.

original: ci ste mi dmigs kyang tha snyad las sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste mi dmigs kyang tha snyad las sgrub pa yin te /
translated: But even if it is not perceived, it is established by convention,

original: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we do not see a convention without conceptualization.

original: tha snyad dang ni rnam rtog dag / rgyu dang 'bras bur grub pas na //
analyzed: tha snyad dang ni rnam rtog dag / rgyu dang 'bras bur grub pas na //
translated: And because of the establishment of the cause and effect of words and concepts,

original: 'dir de 'bras las rjes dpog phyir //
analyzed: 'dir de 'bras las rjes dpog phyir //
translated: here, since the effect is inferred from the cause,

original: brda 'dzin med par ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: brda 'dzin med par ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how can there be no apprehension of the sign?

original: rjes su dpag pas ni sgra sbyor bar byed pa rtogs par ni 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ni sgra sbyor bar byed pa rtogs par ni 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Inference does not ascertain the user of the word,

original: de yang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: 'on te 'di nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin no snyam na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'di nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin no snyam na ma yin te /
translated: If you think this itself is mistaken, it is not so,

original: phyogs nyid kyis ni 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde la ma yin na ni du ba las me rjes su dpog pa la yang phyogs @248a * //
analyzed: phyogs nyid kyis ni 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro // de la ma yin na ni du ba las me rjes su dpog pa la yang phyogs @248a * //
translated: because it is not mistaken due to the very position.

original: nyid kyis 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyid kyis 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then even in the inference of fire from smoke, the position itself would be mistaken.

original: ma yin te /üîΩde ni rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma yin te / de ni rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: No, it is not so.üîΩBecause that is perceived by inference,

original: reg pa dang / tha snyad las kyang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg pa dang / tha snyad las kyang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is understood from contact and convention.

original: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad dam //
analyzed: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad dam //
translated: From the convention of averting cold,

original: reg pa'i rnam par shes pa las //
analyzed: reg pa'i rnam par shes pa las //
translated: or from the consciousness of contact,

original: lkog gyur me yi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: lkog gyur me yi bdag nyid ni //
translated: the hidden nature of fireüîΩis ascertained by inference.

original: rtog na de yang 'thad par dka' //
analyzed: rtog na de yang 'thad par dka' //
translated: If you think that, that too is hard to justify.

original: gal te me med kyang da lta nyid du ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes res 'ga' rjes su dpag par bya ba ma mthong ba'i me the tshom gyi yul du gyur pa der ni /üîΩdu ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa las reg pa'i rnam par shes pa'am /
analyzed: gal te me med kyang da lta nyid du ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes res 'ga' rjes su dpag par bya ba ma mthong ba'i me the tshom gyi yul du gyur pa der ni / du ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa las reg pa'i rnam par shes pa'am /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúEven if there is no fire, smoke exists right now,‚Äù and you infer that sometimes the object of doubt is the non-observation of fire,

original: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad kyis 'khrul pa spong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad kyis 'khrul pa spong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: then you may eliminate confusion by the knowledge of contact or by the convention of the reversal of cold.

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: That too is not correct.

original: reg shes tha snyad dag las ni //
analyzed: reg shes tha snyad dag las ni //
translated: From the knowledge of contact and the convention,

original: rjes su dpag pas de rtogs na //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas de rtogs na //
translated: if you understand that by inference,

original: rjes dpag de yi 'khrul med pa'ang //
analyzed: rjes dpag de yi 'khrul med pa'ang //
translated: then the non-confusion of that inference

original: rjes dpag gzhan las 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rjes dpag gzhan las 'gyur ba yin //
translated: would come from another inference.

original: rjes dpag nyid du mtshungs phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes dpag nyid du mtshungs phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the same in being inferences.

original: de lta yin na thug med 'gyur //üîΩgal te rjes su dpag pa las 'khrul par dogs pa na /
analyzed: de lta yin na thug med 'gyur // gal te rjes su dpag pa las 'khrul par dogs pa na /
translated: If that were so, there would be an infinite regress.üîΩIf you suspect confusion from inference,

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid 'khrul pa med pa'i sgrub byed yin pa de lta na ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid 'khrul pa med pa'i sgrub byed yin pa de lta na ni /
translated: then if inference itself is the proof of non-confusion,

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is similar to inference itself.

original: de'i mtshan nyid can thams cad la dogs par 'gyur ba de ni ma grub pas ma grub pa bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid can thams cad la dogs par 'gyur ba de ni ma grub pas ma grub pa bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: But that is not established, so it is an unestablished reason.

original: reg pas ni gzugs grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: reg pas ni gzugs grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is form established by contact,

original: dung ser por shes pa'i yul la yang reg pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dung ser por shes pa'i yul la yang reg pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because contact exists with respect to the object of the cognition of a yellow conch.

original: gang du du bar 'khrul bar dogs pa der blo sngon du btang nas byas pa'i grang ba med pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni ches shin tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang du du bar 'khrul bar dogs pa der blo sngon du btang nas byas pa'i grang ba med pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni ches shin tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the conventions of ‚Äúnot cold‚Äù and so on, which are made by a mind that has been preceded by doubt about whether it is smoke, would be utterly mistaken.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rnam par rtog pa sgrub pa la gal te phyogs nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag la 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rnam par rtog pa sgrub pa la gal te phyogs nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag la 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, if the position itself is mistaken in the establishment of a conception by inference, then all inferences would be mistaken.

original: rtog pa 'di ni legs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa 'di ni legs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: This conception is not correct.

original: de yang mi bden te /üîΩji ltar du bas dngos stobs las //
analyzed: de yang mi bden te / ji ltar du bas dngos stobs las //
translated: That is also not correct.üîΩAs for smoke,

original: rjes su dpag par ba 'jug cing //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par ba 'jug cing //
translated: inference proceeds by the power of fact,

original: de yang slu ba med mthong ba //
analyzed: de yang slu ba med mthong ba //
translated: and it is seen to be undeceiving.
